Black Hole

An immense sphere of darkness that hides a pinprick with the mass of a thousand stars. Light itself cannot escape the pull of a black hole, so these strange phenomena have fascinated scientists and science-minded civilizations since the dawn of astronomy.
Asteroid Field

A million shards of rock and ice, from the scale of tiny malformed moons to fist-sized clumps, glitter in the light of the distant sun. The remnants of unknown planetary catastrophes or the whims of gravitational quirks, these fields are rich pickings of minerals, rare metals, and methane chunks making them invaluable for developing industries.
Collapsing Star

A short-lived star that has reached the end of its ten-million-year lifespan. As it dies, a massive explosion ejects solar material out of its core at incredible speeds. At a safe distance, a collapsing star looks bright and beautiful.
Solar Nebula

A disc-shaped cloud of gas and dust that will eventually accrete into a protostar and planetary system. For now, the nebula is a vast swirling cloud of danger and opportunity, the kindling materials of the center slowly warming over the millennia while the halo glitters with the remnants of dead stars... and Dust.
Neutron Star

These ultra-dense solar masses, spinning at hundreds of revolutions per second, are the remains of collapsed stars that are almost as dangerous as black holes. They are laboratories for extreme physics that could never be replicated in a planet-bound location; control and exploitation of a neutron star boosts both science and influence.
Nebular Clouds

A massive accumulation of hydrogen plasma that sparkles against a velvet backdrop of stars. Besides their impressive appearance, nebular clouds can contain traces of metals or other heavy elements formed at a galaxy's birth.
Spacefaring Species
Poised at the greatest threshold in the history of your people, these few technologies have helped unlock the door that opens upon the near-infinite wonder and mystery of the galaxy.
Off-world Agribusiness

A host of incremental breakthroughs in trade agreements, cultural translation, and the handling of xeno-foods--together given the umbrella term "off-world agribusiness"--permits diverse types of growth in nutrition, fuel, and material sciences.
Off-world Agribusiness

A host of incremental breakthroughs in trade agreements, cultural translation, and the handling of xeno-foods (which can be cause for alarm for Horatio)--together given the umbrella term "off-world agribusiness"--permits diverse types of growth in nutrition, fuel, and material sciences.
Planetary Landscaping

A tent-pole description of a range of horticultural technologies that together become much greater than the sum of their parts. Germline manipulation, programmed seed dispersal, and artificial pheromone manufacture, are the basis of an incredible tech that can transform whole continents.
Botanical Scanning

Being relatively sedentary and slow-growing, plants are easier to scan and analyze than animals. Systems to tag and scan plant life on a large scale aid immeasurably in efforts to detoxify and colonize new planets and systems.
Botanical Scanning

Being relatively sedentary and slow-growing, plants are easier to scan and analyze than animals. Systems to tag and scan plant life on a large scale aid immeasurably in efforts to detoxify and colonize new planets and systems, greatly contributing to beautification efforts.
Botanical Scanning

Being relatively sedentary and slow-growing, plants are easier to scan and analyze than animals who tend to misbehave in Sophon science experiments. Systems to tag and scan plant life on a large scale aid immeasurably in efforts to detoxify and colonize new planets and systems.
Xenology

First contact with alien beings causes explosive development in branches of study as diverse as linguistics, anthropology, biology, and sociology. These have been brought together under the unifying title of "Xenology".
Xenology

First contact with alien beings causes explosive development in branches of study as diverse as linguistics, anthropology, biology, and sociology as the Church scrambles to sanctify the dangerous new knowledge. These have been brought together under the unifying title of "Xenology".
Adaptive Bureaucracies

These new systems automatically adapt job titles, document routing, and training programs to the latest change in government policy. While it greatly simplifies the efficiency of government, you may get back from a meeting to find you have a new boss, a new job, and an undecorated cubicle.
Adaptive Bureaucracies

These new systems automatically adapt job titles, document routing, and training programs to the latest change in government policy. While it greatly simplifies the efficiency of government, Riftborn can find their rapidly evolving roles bewildering.
Adaptive Bureaucracies

These new systems automatically adapt job titles, document routing, and training programs to the latest change in government policy. While Unfallen are often resistant to such rapid evolution of their roles, the greater chance of a harmonious galaxy is a great salve to the majority.
Xeno Anthropology

The study of alien civilizations, both past and present, can offer great dividends in understanding ones own culture and cultural biases as well as in determining the effects of change and evolution on galactic society.
Xeno Anthropology

The study of alien civilizations, both past and present, can offer great dividends in understanding how patriotic fervor can be enhanced, as well as determining the effects of change and evolution on galactic society.
Inter-Species HR

The famous saying of the Amoeba: "One being's slavery is another being's public welfare plan" certainly applies here. The knowledge of where the fine lines are between different alien species and their definitions of slavery, exploitation, and hard work are of enormous importance to future galactic entrepreneurs.
Inter-Species HR

Becoming a member of the Church of the Virtual Saint can be a difficult transition for individuals of other races. Inter-Species HR ensures that any who come into the Vodyani empire can work effectively from the beginning.
SLC (Supra-Light Content) Systems

If citizens can already travel faster than light, why not news, views, and entertainment? Supra-Light Content Systems are guaranteed to fill the galaxy's air waves with the finest opinions and amusements -- yours.
Cultural Invertics

Originating from a messy but captivating collision of political science, crowd heuristics, and cultural phase shifts, a knowledge of cultural invertics better places a society to both understand and, more importantly, provoke behavioral change on a massive scale.
Perfect Negotiations

Bringing together the disciplines of game theory, facial micro-expressions, and linguistic hierarchies, scientists have developed what they believe to be the blueprint for perfect negotiations. Not coincidentally, several of the pioneers are now extremely wealthy.
Perfect Negotiations

Bringing together the disciplines of game theory, facial micro-expressions, and linguistic hierarchies, scientists have developed what they believe to be the blueprint for perfect negotiations. For the Unfallen, the trick is often ensuring that their tree-like forms adequately communicate what they intend.
Perfect Negotiations

Bringing together the disciplines of game theory, facial micro-expressions, and linguistic hierarchies, scientists have developed what they believe to be the blueprint for perfect negotiations. Some Lumeris have been known to use the knowledge to become the galaxy's supreme gamblers.
Nano Aquaculture

The construction of nano-machines--or nanites--capable of operating in liquid environments with various conditions of salinity, temperature, pressure, and microbial life has a range of potential applications. Research into energy sources, locomotion, and self-repair enables a whole ecology of these liquid nanities to be developed.
Nano Aquaculture

The construction of Church approved nano-machines--or nanites--capable of operating in liquid environments with various conditions of salinity, temperature, pressure, and microbial life has a range of potential applications. Research into energy sources, locomotion, and self-repair enables a whole ecology of these liquid nanities to be developed.
Dust-9 Production

Researchers are still generally baffled by the properties of Dust, but through an arcane series of expensive, preparatory steps they have been able to produce very small quantities of a spin-off substance they're calling Dust-9. Its great expense means it will never become widely available, but its intense hallucinogenic effects could prove useful.
Dust-9 Production

Church philosophers are still generally baffled by the properties of Dust, but through an arcane series of expensive, preparatory steps they have been able to produce very small quantities of a spin-off substance they're calling Dust-9. Its great expense means it will never become widely available, but its intense hallucinogenic effects could prove useful for the upper-echelons of the Church.
Chaotic Meteorology

Predicting the weather is a fraught science that has embarrassed forecasters of all stripes across the ages. Being a perfect example of a chaotic system, the smallest imprecisions in determining the exact initial conditions swiftly leads to unpredictable futures. The science of chaotic meteorology, however, changes all that, enabling more robust and durable forecasts.
Chaotic Meteorology

No strangers to the art of weather forecasting, for the Unfallen predicting the weather is a fraught science. Being a perfect example of a chaotic system, the smallest imprecisions in determining the exact initial conditions swiftly leads to unpredictable futures. The science of chaotic meteorology, however, changes all that, enabling more robust and durable forecasts.
Chlorophyll Chemistry

A beautiful molecule with the structural appearance of a maraca, this complex chain of carbons and hydrogens, with a smattering of oxygen, nitrogen, and magnesium thrown in for good measure, is a wonder of nature. Advances that piggyback off its miraculous ability to capture light energy should be equally wondrous.
Chlorophyll Chemistry

A beautiful molecule with the structural appearance of a maraca, this complex chain of carbons and hydrogens, with a smattering of oxygen, nitrogen, and magnesium thrown in for good measure, is a wonder of nature. Advances that piggyback off its miraculous ability to capture light energy should be hailed wondrous by Church leaders.
Chlorophyll Chemistry

A beautiful molecule with the structural appearance of a maraca, this complex chain of carbons and hydrogens, with a smattering of oxygen, nitrogen, and magnesium thrown in for good measure, is a wonder of nature. Advances that piggyback off its miraculous ability to capture light energy should enrich Lumeris pockets.
Chlorophyll Chemistry

A beautiful molecule with the structural appearance of a maraca, this complex chain of carbons and hydrogens, with a smattering of oxygen, nitrogen, and magnesium thrown in for good measure, is a wonder of nature. Lumeris in the know claim it as wondrous as the best theatrical productions.
HyperPACs

These massive, well-funded Political Action Committees have wide enough influence to not only affect domestic elections according to the government's will, but even control some aspects of intergalactic diplomacy--including starting relations with the fabled Academy and its stable of Dust-enhanced Heroes.
HyperPACs

Such an institution might be unfamiliar to most Unfallen, but these massive, well-funded Political Action Committees have wide enough influence to not only affect domestic elections according to the government's will, but even control some aspects of intergalactic diplomacy--including starting relations with the fabled Academy and its stable of Dust-enhanced Heroes.
HyperPACs

For the Riftborn, these massive, well-funded Political Action Committees have wide enough influence to not only affect domestic elections according to the government's will, but even control some aspects of intergalactic diplomacy--including starting relations with the fabled Academy and its stable of Dust-enhanced Heroes.
HyperPACs

Approved by Emperor Zelevas himself, these massive, well-funded Political Action Committees have wide enough influence to not only affect domestic elections according to the government's will, but even control some aspects of intergalactic diplomacy--including starting relations with the fabled Academy and its stable of Dust-enhanced Heroes.
HyperPACs

Such an institution might be unfamiliar to most Unfallen, but these massive, well-funded Political Action Committees have wide enough influence to not only affect domestic elections according to the government's will, but even control some aspects of intergalactic diplomacy--including starting relations with the fabled Academy and its stable of Dust-enhanced Heroes.
HyperPACs

For the Riftborn, these massive, well-funded Political Action Committees have wide enough influence to not only affect domestic elections according to the government's will, but even control some aspects of intergalactic diplomacy--including starting relations with the fabled Academy and its stable of Dust-enhanced Heroes.
N-Dimensional Industry
By exploiting the nature of reality on either very small (sub-quantum) or very large scales, powerful effects can be achieved that partially fold and reshape reality upon itself.
Cellular Manipulation
A set of bioengineering tools inspired by Horatio scientists that allow researchers to prod, squash, and examine any other organism's cellular structure.
Xenobiology

Studies of soil samples from other planets, when combined with advances in understanding of extremophilic bacteria, permit scientists to create, under certain conditions, hardier and more productive crops.
Xenobiology
Riftborn studies of soil samples from frozen planets, when combined with advances in understanding of extremophilic bacteria, permit scientists to create, under certain conditions, habitable biomes.
Xenobiology

Studies of soil samples from other planets, when combined with advances in understanding of extremophilic bacteria, permit scientists to create the conditions necessary to enable Unfallen roots to take hold in frozen ground.
Rare Earth Foams

Scarce and difficult to manipulate, rare earth metals are nevertheless critical to many advanced technologies. The ability to create viable metallic foams from these unusual metals gives a boost to cutting-edge astrotechnology.
Rare Earth Foams

Scarce and difficult to manipulate, Riftborn scientists are often fascinated by rare earth metals which are critical to many advanced technologies. The ability to create viable metallic foams from these unusual metals gives a boost to cutting-edge astrotechnology.
Rare Earth Foams

Scarce and difficult to manipulate, specialized Unfallen can nonetheless extract the rare earth metals from deep underground. The ability to create viable metallic foams from these unusual metals gives a boost to cutting-edge astrotechnology.
Non-baryonic Particles

The science of non-baryonic particles studies phenomena such as neutrinos, electrons, and black holes. Increasing mastery of these forces also improves our comprehension of known EMR and magnetic effects.
Non-baryonic Particles

Engrossing to Riftborn physicists, the science of non-baryonic particles studies phenomena such as neutrinos, electrons, and black holes. Increasing mastery of these forces also improves Riftborn comprehension of known EMR and magnetic effects.
Non-baryonic Particles

Not an area that impacts--or interests--most Unfallen, the science of non-baryonic particles studies phenomena such as neutrinos, electrons, and black holes. Increasing mastery of these forces also improves Unfallen comprehension of known EMR and magnetic effects.
Baryonic Shielding
While there are some particles that can pass through plasma shielding, this improved version prevents penetration by any baryon particle (primarily neutrons and protons).
Baryonic Shielding
While there are some particles that can pass through plasma shielding and other Unfallen defenses, this improved version prevents penetration by any baryon particle (primarily neutrons and protons).
Baryonic Shielding

While Riftborn understanding of plasmas improves each cycle, there are some particles that can still pass through plasma shielding. This improved version prevents penetration by any baryon particle (primarily neutrons and protons).
Pev-Scale Accelerators

The construction of a high-energy particle accelerator (with energy measured in peta-electron volts) requires highly advanced engineering, science, materials, and energy supplies. Without this type of machine, explorations deeper into sub-quantum mechanics would not be possible.
Pev-Scale Accelerators

The construction of a high-energy particle accelerator (with energy measured in peta-electron volts) in line with Church scripture requires highly advanced engineering, science, materials, and theology. Without this type of machine, explorations deeper into sub-quantum mechanics would not be possible.
Pev-Scale Accelerators

Unfallen construction of a high-energy particle accelerator (with energy measured in peta-electron volts) requires highly advanced engineering, science, materials, and energy supplies. Without this type of machine, explorations deeper into sub-quantum mechanics would not be possible, greatly annoying the handful of Thirds who care about such matters.
Pev-Scale Accelerators

Riftborn construction of a high-energy particle accelerator (with energy measured in peta-electron volts) requires highly advanced engineering, science, materials, and an inversion of Corozian physics. Without this type of machine, explorations deeper into sub-quantum mechanics would not be possible.
Wave Function Control
Research into creating spaces that prevent wave-function collapse in computing devices underpin powerful abilities. No cats will be harmed in the creation of this technology.
Wave Function Control

With no equivalent concept in Corozian physics, research into creating spaces that prevent wave-function collapse in computing devices is beyond the understanding of all but a handful of the most talented of Riftborn scientists. Until cats are commonplace in Riftborn culture, the concept of Schrödinger's cat will be unfathomable.
Wave Function Control

For the Unfallen, the concept of Schrödinger's cat is akin to asking if a tree falling in a forest makes a noise. Research into creating spaces that prevent wave-function collapse in computing devices underpin powerful abilities that the Heart is keen to spread across the empire.
Graviton Research

As particle research becomes increasingly complex, breakthroughs like the isolation and observation of gravitons move many scientific phenomena from the category of "mystery" to the category of "theory".
Graviton Research

In their earliest years, Sophons learn the great particle zoo as nursery rhymes, but even to them the humble graviton is a source of profound wonder. As particle research becomes increasingly complex, breakthroughs like the isolation and observation of gravitons move many scientific phenomena from the category of "mystery" to the category of "theory".
Graviton Research

As particle research becomes increasingly complex, breakthroughs like the isolation and observation of gravitons move many scientific phenomena from the category of "mystery" to the category of "theory". Sophons have never been happier.
Graviton Research

Until a few cycles ago, the Riftborn were blissfully unaware of gravity, never mind its mediator particle. As particle research becomes increasingly complex, breakthroughs like the isolation and observation of gravitons move many scientific phenomena from the category of "mystery" to the category of "theory".
Graviton Research

As particle research becomes increasingly complex, breakthroughs like the isolation and observation of gravitons move many scientific phenomena from the category of "mystery" to the category of "theory". Some Sophons are already planning some outrageous gravity-guns.
Graviton Research

For Firsts and Thirds, gravity is like water to a fish: a constant, permanent backdrop as to be unnoticeable. Not to Seconds though. As particle research becomes increasingly complex, breakthroughs like the isolation and observation of gravitons move many scientific phenomena from the category of "mystery" to the category of "theory".
Compact Warp Methods

Based on the technology used to shrink fusion systems, improved energy sources are now available for ship engine development. This allows faster movement with an equivalent engine size. Initial successes with the warp field engine system have spurred research and engineering. The speed and maneuverability of the ships have improved, and much of the time the crew is now able to see where they are going.
Compact Warp Methods

Based on the technology used to shrink fusion systems, improved energy sources are now available for ship engine development. This allows faster movement with an equivalent engine size. Initial successes with the warp field engine system have spurred research and engineering. The speed and maneuverability of the ships have improved, but research into their beauty is still ongoing.
Evaporation Inhibitors

Not the most glamorous of novel technologies, a firm grasp of the proto-science of evaporation inhibition nonetheless can grant access to some very useful toys. Like toys to stop all your fuel or water boiling away.
Evaporation Inhibitors

For the Riftborn, a puddle, in its transient nature, is a source of endless fascination. Not the most glamorous of novel technologies to other races, a firm grasp of the proto-science of evaporation inhibition is an amazing thing for the Riftborn.
Evaporation Inhibitors

For the Unfallen, the element of water is almost as important as that of fire. Not the most glamorous of novel technologies, a firm grasp of the proto-science of evaporation inhibition nonetheless can grant access to some very useful toys. Like toys to stop all your fuel or water boiling away.
Evaporation Inhibitors

Not the most glamorous of novel technologies, a firm grasp of the proto-science of evaporation inhibition nonetheless can grant access to some theologically-approved abilities. Anything that can further the Church's aims usually is approved, mind you.
Autonomous Materials
Smart materials that can adapt to local conditions, so that structures can retain their structural integrity. Useful for areas with a high incidence of earthquakes.
Autonomous Materials
Smart, Church-approved materials that can adapt to local conditions, so that structures can retain their structural integrity. Useful for areas with a high incidence of earthquakes.
Ultra-Deep Habitats

Creating a living space deep in the core of a planet that doesn't come with a serious risk of death is no easy task. Intense pressures, magma ruptures, and dust asphyxiation are just the beginning of a long list of things that could kill you. With this tech you're safe*. *Barring unhinged habitat-mates.
Low Kelvin Sciences
Insights into the properties of materials at temperatures barely above absolute zero should underpin advances in analyzing or dealing with extreme cold conditions.
Applied Casimir Effect
Extending the work on quantum fluctuations of electromagnetic fields, the applied Casimir effect goes much further, enabling the fabric of space-time to be "ripped" open.
Applied Casimir Effect

Extending the work on quantum fluctuations of electromagnetic fields, the applied Casimir effect goes much further, enabling the fabric of space-time to be "ripped" open. Vodyani leaders look forward with great zeal at discovering its applications.
N-Dimensional Topologies
An understanding of the mathematics of high-dimensional surfaces as well as being great for anecdotes at parties, has some surprising applications.
N-Dimensional Topologies
The insights, discovered by a member of the Silent Philosophers sect, give an understanding of the mathematics of high-dimensional surfaces.
Regolith Processing

Regolith, rock dust formed by time's relentless march over the eons, can be a terrible impediment to the exploration of airless moons, as it clogs machinery, short-circuits silicon chips, and settles on thirsty solar panels. Now through some nifty chemistry, this fine powder can be rendered impotent.
Tendrils of the Church

An suite of technologies that come together to allow the Virtual Saint leadership the ability to spread its tendrils into every facet of Vodyani life. Surveillance, investigation, discipline. All will obey.
Adaptive Colonies

Planetary anomalies can be caused by a great number of widely varying problems. As technologies and knowledge of xenobiology improves, a number of palliative mechanisms are developed to allow civilian populations to thrive regardless of local conditions (improved management of habitats and biospheres, cheaper and more reliable energy sources, more pragmatic processes to adapt to alien environments...).
Adaptive Colonies
The Church faces a number of unique issues in its Ark-based society, and Adaptive Colonies are an umbrella term that allows the Vodyani to get the most out of their captive congregations.
Radioactive Essence
Less a real technology, and more an instrument to instill fear, Essence can be tagged with radioactive markers, encouraging captive populations to volunteer the substance even faster.
Pious Timekeeping
A special diet for Vodyani citizens that subtly alters natural biochemical balances, causing shortened sleep cycles. The additional waking hours can be used for a number of more devout activities.
Ontological Rev-Eng

Ontological reverse-engineering is the science of understanding the purpose and provenance of things. Although the methods are somewhat difficult to master, the technology is fascinating to most individuals.
Ontological Rev-Eng

Through intense focus, ontological reverse-engineering allows Church followers the ability to understand the purpose and provenance of things. Although the methods are somewhat difficult to master, the technology is fascinating to most individuals.
Psychohistory+

Combining history, sociology, and mathematical statistics, psychohistory+ aims both to make robust predictions about the future behavior of large populations, and be used as a tool to better understand the past.
Advanced Non-Baryonics

Exploration into the nature of anti-particles, coupled with a better understanding of the effects of polarity and time on non-baryonic matter, is beginning to unlock a great deal of insight into all forms of matter. Everything is strange and new in these experiments, from the math required to understand it to the buildings necessary to contain it.
Machine Bacteria
Combining insights from extra-terrestrial bacteria and the nascent art of nano-machines, this new breed of mechanical organisms can provide assistance in more extreme conditions.
Machine Bacteria
Combining insights from extra-terrestrial bacteria and the nascent art of nano-machines, this new breed of mechanical organisms integrate with Unfallen roots and vines to provide new applications.
Machine Bacteria
Combining insights from extra-terrestrial bacteria and the deep Riftborn art of nano-machines, this new breed of mechanical organisms can provide assistance in more extreme conditions.
Vacuum Protection
A better understanding of the interaction between material surfaces and hard vacuums allows more hardy space-critical systems to be created.
Vacuum Protection

Learning more every day outside the Coroz universe, a better understanding of the interaction between material surfaces and hard vacuums allows Riftborn engineers to create more hardy space-critical systems.
Quantum Evasion

Given sufficiently advanced materials and sufficiently advanced technology, ship systems can be develop that phase in and out of physical space and time in immeasurably small movements. Partially hacked from Riftborn tech and partially the product of Sophon genius, the results speak for themselves.
Eukaryotic Sap
Advancing from a basic understanding of xeno vegetation, this technology introduces cellular manipulation to create robust saps that have a range of applications.
Eukaryotic Sap
Advancing from a basic understanding of xeno vegetation, this technology introduces cellular manipulation to create robust saps that have a range of applications even to the Unfallen.
Eukaryotic Sap
Advancing from a basic understanding of xeno vegetation, this technology introduces cellular manipulation to create robust saps that Riftborns can utilize in a number of different scenarios.
Eukaryotic Sap
Advancing from a basic understanding of xeno vegetation, this technology introduces cellular manipulation to create robust--and beautiful--saps that have a range of applications.
Eukaryotic Sap

Another brilliant advance for Horatio science. Advancing from a basic understanding of xeno vegetation, this technology introduces cellular manipulation to create robust saps that have a range of applications.
Eukaryotic Sap
Horatio's brilliance is unbound! Advancing from a basic understanding of xeno vegetation, this technology introduces cellular manipulation to create robust saps that have a range of applications.
Eukaryotic Sap

Advancing from a basic understanding of xeno vegetation, this technology introduces cellular manipulation to create robust saps that have a range of applications. Don't bring up the fact that pure luck led to this Sophon technology.
Eukaryotic Sap
Sophon science FTW! Advancing from a basic understanding of xeno vegetation, this technology introduces cellular manipulation to create robust saps that have a range of applications.
Eukaryotic Sap
Advancing from a basic understanding of xeno vegetation, this Sophon technology introduces cellular manipulation to create robust saps that have a range of applications.
Eukaryotic Sap
Advancing from a basic Riftborn understanding of xeno vegetation, this technology introduces cellular manipulation to create robust saps that have a range of applications.
Eukaryotic Sap
Advancing from a comparison of Unfallen and xeno vegetation, this technology introduces cellular manipulation to create robust saps that have a range of applications.
Eukaryotic Sap
Advancing from a basic understanding of xeno vegetation, this Coroz-inspired technology introduces cellular manipulation to create robust saps that have a range of applications.
Climate Engineering

The technology to alter long-term weather systems at the planetary scale is an incredibly complicated process that marries insights into stochastic methods, cloud dynamics, solar modelling, and seeding swarms.
Climate Engineering

The Vodyani technology to alter long-term weather systems at the planetary scale is an incredibly complicated process that marries insights into stochastic methods, cloud dynamics, solar modelling, and seeding swarms.
Climate Engineering

The technology to alter long-term weather systems at the planetary scale is an incredibly complicated process that marries insights into stochastic methods, cloud dynamics, solar modelling, and seeding swarms. Fortunately many of mathematical methods are well understood by Riftborn scientists.
Dimensional Folding
Very useful for packing things into a tight space, this technology relies on zero-point fields, and has potential applications in many areas.
Dimensional Folding
Very useful for packing things into a tight space (like heathens in solitary confinement), this technology relies on zero-point fields, and has potential applications in many areas.
Xenolinguistics

Whether you wish to make trade, research, wage war, or have peaceful relations with aliens, their communications must first be studied and conversation brought to a higher level than merely dropping prepositions and speaking more loudly.
Xenolinguistics

Whether you wish to make trade, research, wage war, or have peaceful relations with non-Sophons, their communications must first be studied and conversation brought to a higher level than merely dropping prepositions and speaking more loudly.
Plasma Metallurgy

Under carefully-controlled conditions, the application of extremely high currents through molten metallics, can produce metal plasmas. Aside from being fascinating to plasma physicists, these substances underpin some engineering marvels.
Galactic Commodities Exchange

The cries of hawkers, the jabber of negotiations, and the clink of coins have been replaced by electronic screens and invisible buy/sell orders. But this galactic clearing house for trade in Luxury and Strategic Resources still throbs with culture clashes and cutthroat commerce.
Multi-Thread Management

In order to handle the speed and complexity of a starbound economy, new management processes are required. One of these uses multiple professionals working in parallel on the same logistics and procurement tasks, handling multiple concurrent issues in real time.
Multi-Thread Management

For Riftborn to handle the speed and complexity of a starbound economy, a firm grasp of the latest non-Corozian management techniques are required. One of these uses multiple workers toiling in parallel on the same logistics and procurement tasks, handling multiple concurrent issues in real time.
Multi-Thread Management

In order to handle the speed and complexity of an Ark-focused economy, new leadership methods are needed. One of these uses multiple professionals working in parallel on the same logistics and procurement tasks, handling multiple concurrent issues in real time.
Astrofinance

Balancing ledgers and budgets across both time and space is not a simple task. Without even going into the complexities of options and interest rates, a great deal of pragmatic work needs to be done on financial systems and needs of alien suppliers and customers.
Astrofinance

Balancing Church ledgers and budgets across both time and space is not a simple task. Without even going into the complexities of options and interest rates, a great deal of pragmatic work needs to be done on financial systems and the needs of alien vassals.
Impactless Sites

As science and technology evolve, industrial sites must deal with increasingly dangerous substances handled under increasingly extreme conditions. The science of building these sites in an environmentally neutral way is critical for public health.
Impactless Sites

As science and technology evolve, Vodyani industrial sites must deal with increasingly dangerous substances handled under increasingly extreme conditions. The science of building these sites in an environmentally neutral way is critical for worshipers' health.
Impactless Sites

As science and technology evolve, industrial sites must deal with increasingly dangerous substances handled under increasingly extreme conditions. The science of building these sites in an environmentally neutral way--instead of the usual Lumeris way of digging a hole--is critical for public health.
Impactless Sites

As Lumerian science and technology evolves, industrial sites must deal with increasingly dangerous substances handled under increasingly extreme conditions. Throwing waste into semi-legal landfills is no longer an option, and the science of building these sites in an environmentally neutral way is critical for public health.
Neural Robotics

One problem with coordinating robots and having them efficiently function is their 'brains' and the associated networking. Advances in signal technology and computing algorithms now allow us to have vast numbers of robots that communicate and execute functions in seamless coordination.
Neural Robotics

One problem with coordinating robots and having them efficiently function is that their 'brains' are not the equal of Horatio's. Advances in signal technology and computing algorithms, however allow Horatio to have vast numbers of robots that communicate and execute functions in seamless coordination.
Neural Robotics

One problem with coordinating robots and having them efficiently function is that their 'brains' are not the equal of Horatio's. Advances in signal technology and computing algorithms, however allow Horatio to have vast numbers of robots that communicate and execute functions in seamless coordination.
Neural Robotics

One problem with coordinating robots and having them efficiently function is their lack of understanding of Church theology. Advances in signal technology and computing algorithms now allow the Vodyani to have vast numbers of robots that execute functions in harmony with Virtual Saint doctrine.
Maximized Exploitation

Early industrial societies are more or less vast engines for producing waste; little of what is initially taken from the ground actually ends up as a product and the rest is dumped. By maximizing the processes of extraction, refining, transport, storage, and distribution, enormous gains in efficiency and volume can come with the added value of reduced waste.
Maximized Exploitation

Industrial societies are more or less vast engines for producing waste; little of what is initially taken from the ground actually ends up as a product and the rest is dumped. As this is alien to the Unfallen notion of harmony and their desire for untouched forests, they seek to maximize output while minimizing waste and pollution.
Maximized Exploitation

Early industrial societies are more or less vast engines for producing waste; by contrast, the life of the Riftborn before they came to this galaxy did not have this trouble. In order to recreate the simple and uncluttered world they left behind, they strive to minimize waste and make maximally efficient use of resources.
Commercial Frameworks

Trade on a galactic scale requires agreements, laws, regulations, and protocols. Before trade company headquarters and subsidiaries can be built, docking space acquired, and goods shipped, a network of complex contracts must be negotiated.
Relativistic Economics

The effect of time dilation and space travel on traditional financial models is non-negligible. This new branch of economics provides a basis for defining investment and profit under non-Newtonian physics in non-Euclidean space-time, e.g. observed interest rates, human capital erosion, and NPV (Net Proto-Heisenberg Value).
Chameleon Spaces

Bringing together the best industrial engineers and science researchers and tasking them with designing multi-purpose spaces, where manufacturing plants can swiftly be co-opted into research hubs, can lead to some very flexible star systems . . . and some very confused factory workers.
Chameleon Spaces

Bringing together the best industrial engineers and science researchers and tasking them with designing multi-purpose spaces sounds like Sophon heaven--gadgets, arguments, experimentation, and change. In reality, there aren't so many arguments as they are too busy designing the next iteration.
Chameleon Spaces

Bringing together the best industrial engineers and science researchers and tasking them with designing multi-purpose spaces sounds can make a raucous mess of gadgets, arguments, experimentation, and change. The purpose is a pragmatic one, however, and the results are excellent.
Chameleon Spaces

Bringing together the best industrial engineers and science researchers and tasking them with designing multi-purpose spaces is an excellent way to gain efficiency. Under the watchful eyes of the Custos, the adaptation to the new spaces is done with diligence and alacrity.
Galactic Security Charter

An unsexy technology on paper, the Galactic Security Charter is a blend of legal, scientific, economic, and political frameworks that provide an overall structure for corporate and individual security across the enormous distances of the galaxy. In practice, the tech can lead to much greater trade security and more sharing of effective piracy countermeasures.
Galactic Security Charter

An unsexy technology on paper, the Galactic Security Charter is a blend of legal, scientific, economic, and political frameworks that provide an overall structure for corporate and individual security across the enormous distances of the galaxy. These charters are studied in detail, for the better you know them, the better you can bend them to your needs.
Quantized Economics

One for the rocket scientists' rocket scientist, a true understanding of quantum economics is limited to AI superintelligences and the Academy's brightest, but the power of its applications can be comprehended by even the most gill-breathing of Lumerian currency exchangers.
Quantized Economics

As a general rule, a true understanding of quantum economics is limited to AI superintelligences and the Academy's brightest. By using some virtualization and augmented reality systems of the Cloth, however, Vodyani experts can manage the calculations and explain the results to even the least enlightened.
Crust Engineering
An ability to work safely and effectively in and beneath planetary crusts can lead to great boons in industrial productivity as the riches of a world become more easily attainable.
Crust Engineering

As they are a people who tend to remain on ships, subterranean engineering works are an area difficult for the Vodyani to understand. But their grim dedication and the use of sophisticated robotics still allows them to profit from the riches hidden deep within planets.
Gamma Absorption

The sciences of fields and materials have improved to the point that industrial platforms allowing the absorption and control of electromagnetic energy across the spectrum can be built in the harshest conditions .
Mineral Manipulation
As knowledge of crystal lattice structures improves and mining and refining technologies advance, resources can be exploited in previously impossible ways for profit and production.
Optimized Logistics

Optimized logistics are a result of NP-hard solutions to organizational problems. Computational solutions to large-scale distribution networks, when extended into time-relative mathematics (and even with very high time complexity), have a surprising number of applications beyond simple demand management and load prediction.
Exa-Volt Beam Focus
Sophisticated microcircuit machinery enables high energy electromagnetic radiation to be corralled and focused for a range of uses.
Xeno NLP

Analysis of alien societies coupled with discussions with scouts and traders allows diplomats and psychologists to determine alien thought patterns, speech constructs, and ways to influence their behavior.
Xeno NLP

Analysis of alien societies coupled with discussions with scouts and traders allows diplomats and psychologists to determine alien thought patterns, speech constructs, and ways to influence their behavior. The Lumeris are particularly keen on this, as reading aliens is a critical skill in negotiations.
Autonomous Mining
The continued infiltration of AI systems into industry has resulted in mines that operate independently of supervision--full time, at maximum output and lower cost.
Autonomous Mining

The continued infiltration of AI systems into industry has resulted in mines that operate independently of supervision--full time, at maximum output and lower cost. The Sophon overseers still try to out-think them, and the resulting game is a boon to productivity.
Autonomous Mining

The continued infiltration of AI systems into industry has resulted in mines that operate independently of supervision. While some peoples are leery of this, for many it has been a boon as mines operate at full time and with maximum.
Autonomous Mining

The continued infiltration of AI systems into industry has resulted in mines that operate independently of supervision. Nevertheless, Vodyani Custos are often on site to ensure that the processes and products are blessed and purified.
Reidite-7 Catalyzation

An extremely rare mineral occasionally found in meteorite impact craters, reidite-7's conditions of formation are not well understood. What is known is the mineral's incredible catalyzation properties, especially in adamantian reactions. It also has some interesting . . . ahem . . . "pharmaceutical" qualities as can be attested by the Kalgeros Nelly Sira Ninpere.
Megarisk Containment

Extreme high-risk engineering projects are not usually undertaken on account of the chance of failure which can lead to deaths, collateral damage, and severely adverse publicity. However, with intricate systems that can handle compensation, clean-up, PR, and rebuilding, megarisky endeavors can now confidently be undertaken.
Extreme Atmospherics

Forecasting and controlling the high-gravity and highly toxic atmospheres of gas giants is a science that requires inordinate amounts of computing power. Without great advances in mathematics, materials science, and sub-quantum physics it would not even be thinkable.
Extreme Atmospherics

Forecasting and controlling the high-gravity and highly toxic atmospheres of gas giants is a science that requires inordinate amounts of computing power. Fortunately, Vodyani expeditions can apply the additional computing power of their holy Cloth to help manage these projects.
P.O.W.E.R. Armor

Protective and Operational Wild Environment Readiness Armor is essentially the toughest, strongest, most dexterous, and comfortable mech-suit that science can design. Radiation? Pressure? Winds? Temperatures? Allows workers to toil in all of the most extreme environments.
P.O.W.E.R. Armor

Phased Operational Weightless Readiness armor is an additional layer of protection to protect Riftborn workers from the negative effects of harsh environments. Gravity, radiation, sound, and other damaging waves are reduced and even minimized.
P.O.W.E.R. Armor

Purified Operations Wear is an augmented form of holy Cloth that has been specially designed to help the faithful work in extreme environments. Radiation, pressure, wind, and temperature extremes can be ignored in pursuit of the Church's goals.
P.O.W.E.R. Armor

Purified Operations Wear is an augmented form of holy Cloth that has been specially designed to help the faithful work in extreme environments. Radiation, pressure, wind, and temperature extremes can be ignored in pursuit of the Church's goals.
Atmospheric Filtration
A first step in purifying and preparing planets for colonization or terraforming consists of reducing toxic elements in the atmosphere and creating tolerable chemical balances.
Atmospheric Filtration

A first step in purifying and preparing planets for colonization or terraforming consists of reducing toxic elements in the atmosphere. The Unfallen have a native expertise in environmental purification, and applying advanced scientific methods further improves this.
Atmospheric Filtration

The host of hostile or unpleasant chemicals and particles that bombard the Riftborn can damage both their bodies and their morale. While in theory they are immune to problems of terraformation, in reality they much prefer sterile, empty atmospheres.
Ultratough Materials
Harder than diamond, ultratough materials can give added life to industrial processes involving the most intense environments, with spin-offs in other areas too.
Dust Micro Loans
A pioneering economic experiment in giving small micro-loans of Dust to the majority of citizens, has been shown to have a range of potential benefits.
N-Way Fusion

Previously thought a practical impossibility, recent advances in shielding technology permit more than two bodies to be involved in a fusion reaction. This opens up the door to enormous leaps in energy generation.
N-Way Fusion

Previously thought a practical impossibility, recent advances in shielding technology permit more than two bodies to be involved in a fusion reaction. This powerful fusion reaction, known as "Lighting the Beacon", brings advanced power to the Vodyani Arks.
Ubiquitous Surveillance

Everyone's safer when nobody has any secrets, right? Every part of the world is awash with data capture devices from nano-cameras to eavesdropping flies to chemical sniffers, not to mention digital trawlers.
Unstable Isotope Machining
High nuclear mass materials that have been artificially created are not necessarily stable. The technology to contain and exploit them has many practical, if violent, applications.
Unstable Isotope Machining

High nuclear mass materials that have been artificially created are not necessarily stable. Vodyani knowledge of containment systems, extrapolated from the engineering of their Cloth, helps to improve weapons systems based on these materials.
Focused Plasma
Hot, high-speed plasma beams are potentially devastating weapons. While they are difficult to use on planets due to the interference of the atmosphere, in space they are quite effective.
Autonomous Construction

Infrastructure projects can benefit from this newly developed ability to auto-generate structures. Blueprints, bills of order, storage, planning, fabrication, and construction can now be done rapidly and autonomously by independent machines.
High-Energy Magnetics

The trouble with high strength magnetic fields—aside, of course, from the enormous efforts needed to create them—is that they play havoc with any nearby electronics: comm devices, lab equipment, even in some unfortunate cases, pacemakers. With high-energy magnetics tech, however, these problems go away.
High-Energy Magnetics

The trouble with high strength magnetic fields—aside, of course, from the enormous efforts needed to create them—is that they play havoc with any nearby electronics. Even the natural forms of the Unfallen are mineral-rich, so particular systems and safeguards are needed to effectively master this powerful technology.
Hardened Alloys
Doping standard military-grade metals with alloy substrate of complex metals leads to substantially hardened materials that have a wide range of deadly or defensive uses.
Chitinous Alloys
Rebuilding metals using the architecture of insectoid chitin results in alloys of complex metals leads that are substantially hardened and provide a wide range of military uses.
Advanced Fusion Power
Leaps in materials and signaling sciences have resulted in fusion systems that can be contained in warheads of many sizes, nicknamed "pico-suns".
Hyperium Magnetics
Research into the interplay between hyperium and high-strength magnetic fields can improve the quality of the hyperium-composed constructions.
Titanium Electroplating
Investigations into relaying complex shifting currents through titanium wafers has led to a novel technology that permits repulsive fields to exist above the surface of the metal.
Survival Suits

Whether on the ground or in space, the survival of skilled, trained, and cybernetically enhanced warriors is critical -- both to mission success and to return on investment. Suits must ensure that the user is unharmed, well-nourished, and able to communicate.
Improved Fleet Management

The complexities of managing a fleet are enormous, and more so when the problems of time, distance, and communication stretch across a galaxy. Systems of Command, Control, and Communications that move at the speed of thought are necessary, and would likely not be possible without a rudimentary understanding of Dust.
Improved Fleet Management

The complexities of managing a fleet are enormous, and more so when the problems of time, distance, and communication stretch across a galaxy. Systems of Command, Control, and Communications augmented by Dust and moving at the speed of thought are necessary to do this effectively; the Cravers' natural tendency to think as a hive is an advantage in this.
Improved Fleet Management

The complexities of managing a fleet are enormous, and more so when the problems of time, distance, and communication stretch across a galaxy. Empire researchers have nevertheless used advanced Dust- and quantum-coupling theory to allow real-time C3 command of fleets; nervous commanders make decisions knowing that Zelevas may be listening.
Adamantian Alloys
Doping pure adamantian with a carefully calibrated amount of other metals can lead to alloys with incredible properties.
Adamantian Alloys
Doping pure adamantian with a carefully calibrated amount of other metals can lead to alloys with properties that are useful for the Empire's weapons, and very annoying for its enemies.
Adamantian Alloys
Doping pure adamantian with a carefully calibrated amount of other metals leads to alloys with useful properties. Unhappily, the Unfallen accept that the majority of these uses involve warfare.
Structured Antimatter
In order to make antimatter a reliable source for weapons and defense systems, it needs to be controlled in these contained exploitable matrices.
Structured Antimatter

In order to make antimatter a reliable source for weapons and defense systems, it needs to be controlled in an exploitable matrix. When the Custos are not watching, the technologists have been known to joke about "Antimatter Cloth".
Adamantian Electroplating
Similar to research into titanium electroplating, adamantian electroplating goes one step further by using photon-pulsing technology to further bolster defensive fields.
Antimatter Channeling

Although high-risk in terms of handling the material (and several calamitous accidents have been catalogued over the years--look up the infamous Sophon scientist Galar Fazweem for one of the most extreme cases), antimatter channeling can be used to protect constructions from attack by nullifying incoming ordnance and then dispersing the resultant heat.
Universal Aerodynamics

Designing craft capable of handling the transition from space to atmospheric battle theatres has always been difficult, but a new understanding of air flow under extremes of pressure and temperature has led to universal aerodynamic tech.
Deniable Operations

Controlling the flow of information in any war is imperative to victory. Now that the art of erasing the existence of military operations has been perfected--no memories, no physical evidence, no digital trails left--this ultimate goal is much closer.
Deniable Operations

Controlling the flow of information in any war is imperative to victory. While the Cravers care little for the opinion of their own population, the Hive is smart enough to know that the opinions of others can affect military outcomes. Learning to erase the existence of military operations gives the Cravers more options for their favorite way of handling diplomacy.
Tensor Algorithms
Underpinning advances in coordinating battlefield assets, tensor algorithms marry higher-order mathematics and computable instructions to make systems more reactive.
Advanced Game Theory

Fighting equally intelligent battle systems often leads to stalemate, as both parties can predict and enact optimal solutions. Advanced Game Theory, utilizing relativistic physics, helps get back the edge.
Orichalcix Alignment

In the search to produce ever more powerful weapons, the ability to extrude flawless orichalcix ingots identical at the molecular level increases the quality and durability of orichalcix weapons and defenses.
Programmable Quadrinix

Successfully storing the stuff is one matter, but if you want to do anything useful with quadrinix you need to be able to shift it. And in the case of military uses you want to be able to do that fast. Fortunately, the invention of heavy matter-quadrinix software interfaces, allows precisely that.
Interleaved Orichalcix

Experiments in combining organic matter with threads of orichalcix in horticultural research stations has unlocked an incredibly resilient form of the metal--interleaved orichalcix--which can enhance hull integrity considerably.
Quadrinix Toroids
Containing quadrinix stores in toroidal shells allows the material to be projected with much greater control, enhancing its defensive capabilities.
Quantum Communications

A true, robust quantum communications network doesn't only make decryption attacks a lot less likely. Arguably the more important effect is that communications are many orders of magnitude faster, allowing a larger number of independent components to be coordinated.
Quantum Communications

A quantum communications network does more than make decryption attacks difficult; it also means that communications are orders of magnitude faster. This allows a larger number of independent components to be coordinated, making control of the mass armies of the Hive more direct and more efficient.
War As Hobby

War as diversion and entertainment has long been a cultural staple; modern technology and the use of androids and advanced comm systems allows any citizen with a bit of free time to fight as a soldier in on-going conflicts.
Subatomic Disruption
Understanding the links between and within subatomic particles leads to military applications where those links are suddenly and explosively disrupted.
Subatomic Disruption

Understanding the links between and within subatomic particles leads to military applications where those links are explosively disrupted. Riftborn researchers refer to these controlled accidents as "sub-q rifts".
Hyperfield Generators
Using quadrinix and other potent energy sources, shields and defensive field technologies gain enormous power and resilience, making a noticeable improvement in ship and troop survivability.
Hyperfield Generators

Using quadrinix and other potent energy sources, shields and defensive field technologies gain enormous power and resilience. The forces of the Hive become better armed, better protected, and increasingly lethal.
Efficient Shielding

By augmenting the natural magnetic characteristics of the hull material and using lighter alloys in construction, this improved ship design gives bonuses to tonnage and improves kinetic and missile defense.
Extreme Composites

As technology advances, less and less of a ship's guts are made from metal, and more and more from advanced materials or composites based on exotic substances like graphene, glass, nanotubes, aerogels, and metal foams.
Agri Drugs

Pharmaceutical research into the mind-expanding compounds found in rare plants, combined with newer methods of plant grafting and genetics, can result in processed foods that help make more pliant civilians.
Applied Cryogenics
Transforming the storage of otherwise highly perishable foodstuffs, this technology has consequences for both ship design and culinary standards.
Split-second Ablatives

When under fire, the ability to disperse the attacking energy swiftly—whether it be of the kinetic, explosive, or beam variety—is vital for prolonging ship integrity. As super conductors at all thermal wavelengths, split-second ablatives achieve exactly this, transforming what would've been searing burns into nothing more than a slight warming.
Low Temperature Construction

It may be energetically expensive, but constructing metal alloys a few microdegrees above absolute zero, allows the structure to attain a level of regularity that is impossible for traditional methods. Materials are even stronger as a result.
Dependency Algorithms

Vast starships can only operate under the guidance of sophisticated central control systems that are under constant risk of singularity events. Dependency algorithms ensure that any such super-AI that is birthed quickly becomes addicted and controllable.
Liquid Composites

A breakthrough in composite materials, the addition of the "liquid" aspect allows objects built from these substances to maintain their basic structural integrity while being able to "reinforce" parts under greater duress. Handy for racket-based sports players with anger management issues.
Far Halo Shipyard

The construction of the largest vessels relies on near-perfect environmental conditions free from gravitational and electromagnetic disturbances that could render the craft flawed. Far Halo Shipyards constructed at the calm margins of solar systems fulfil this brief.

Insectoid Translation

The intricacy of Craver communication is often lost when Cravers are not face-to-face as much language is transmitted through odors and vibrational tics and scratches. This technology enables these physical channels to be digitally captured and relayed along with visual and audio signals.

Emperor's Shadow
Empire scientists have managed to amplify deep-space signals to the extent that even on the edge of the Empire's territory, patriots are intimately aware of the Emperor's gaze and feelings.

Genetic Recoding
Splicing together different "alphabets" of genetic information can only happen once universal genetic languages have been created. This is such a technology.

Sophonic Noosphere

Discreet brain-chips that allow citizens of the Sophonity to engage in the group collective at a subconscious, emotional level. Kinda like soaking up the vibe at a festival--except the festival is system-wide.

Veil of the Essence

Church-sanctioned investigations into the nature of Essence, have uncovered some surprisingly results: as well as providing nourishment, a special blend of the substance is able to give intellectual stimulation as well.

The construction of the largest vessels relies on near-perfect environmental conditions free from gravitational and electromagnetic disturbances that could render the craft flawed. Far Halo Shipyards constructed at the calm margins of solar systems fulfil this brief.
Untraceable Markets

Lumeris "numbers" (or economists as other races call them) have invented some clever systems that would allow the creation of what they're calling untraceable markets. Peacetime relations are necessary for the systems to be flawless.
Efficient Shielding

By augmenting the natural magnetic characteristics of the hull material and using lighter alloys in construction, this improved ship design gives bonuses to tonnage and improves kinetic and missile defense.
Extreme Composites

As technology advances, less and less of a ship's guts are made from metal, and more and more from advanced materials or composites based on exotic substances like graphene, glass, nanotubes, aerogels, and metal foams.
Agri Drugs

Pharmaceutical research into the mind-expanding compounds found in rare plants, combined with newer methods of plant grafting and genetics, can result in processed foods that help make more pliant civilians.
Applied Cryogenics
Transforming the storage of otherwise highly perishable foodstuffs, this technology has consequences for both ship design and culinary standards.
Split-second Ablatives

When under fire, the ability to disperse the attacking energy swiftly—whether it be of the kinetic, explosive, or beam variety—is vital for prolonging ship integrity. As super conductors at all thermal wavelengths, split-second ablatives achieve exactly this, transforming what would've been searing burns into nothing more than a slight warming.
Low Temperature Construction

It may be energetically expensive, but constructing metal alloys a few microdegrees above absolute zero, allows the structure to attain a level of regularity that is impossible for traditional methods. Materials are even stronger as a result.
Dependency Algorithms

Vast starships can only operate under the guidance of sophisticated central control systems that are under constant risk of singularity events. Dependency algorithms ensure that any such super-AI that is birthed quickly becomes addicted and controllable.
Liquid Composites

A breakthrough in composite materials, the addition of the "liquid" aspect allows objects built from these substances to maintain their basic structural integrity while being able to "reinforce" parts under greater duress. Handy for racket-based sports players with anger management issues.
Far Halo Shipyard

The construction of the largest vessels relies on near-perfect environmental conditions free from gravitational and electromagnetic disturbances that could render the craft flawed. Far Halo Shipyards constructed at the calm margins of solar systems fulfil this brief.
Resonator of the Heart
A reception technology building on insights into tendrils that allows the resonances of the Unfallen's Heart to be picked up lightyears away.
Efficient Shielding

By augmenting the natural magnetic characteristics of the hull material and using lighter alloys in construction, this improved ship design gives bonuses to tonnage and improves kinetic and missile defense.
Extreme Composites

As super conductors at all thermal wavelengths, split-second ablatives achieve exactly this, transforming what would've been searing burns into nothing more than a slight warming.

Dependency Algorithms

Liquid Composites

Far Halo Shipyard

The construction of the largest vessels relies on near-perfect environmental conditions free from gravitational and electromagnetic disturbances that could render the craft flawed. Far Halo Shipyards constructed at the calm margins of solar systems fulfil this brief.
Personal Singularities
This technology enables pocket-sized singularities to be created, which have interesting applications when applied to Dust.
Hardcore Hulls
Thanks to ENFER's data collection and analyses, you are able to build less expensive ships without sacrificing their effectiveness.
Irrational Relations

Bribery is complex and risky, but some bizarre civilizations make decisions based on "feelings" rather than logic. Thanks to ENFER's observations you're now able to use a Minor Civilization's avidity to seduce them by offering Luxury Resources.
Virtual Optimization
ENFER's experience with ruins and artifacts from the Endless and other dead spacefaring species has given it a great number of innovative ideas for technology design and optimization.
Refined Manufacturing
The analysis of structural efficiency can now be done in enormous detail and with a vast range of materials. Subsequent advances allow large ships to pack even larger modules, and more of them.
Wealth of the Endless

Infinitely expandable quantum computers with simple time-shift ability are an example of the kind of technology now available. Perfection in pricing, planning, and executing anything from stock trades to massive multi-year projects can be done with an efficiency not seen since the Endless ruled the galaxy.
Wealth of the Endless
Genius of the Endless

The concept of knowledge and science has fundamentally changed. Your empire is able to record and analyze all known facts; even understanding the interplay of real and imaginary subatomic particles and forces has become obvious. The Endless themselves would be impressed.
Genius of the Endless
Power of the Endless

Mysteries of power politics, game theory, strategy and growth no longer exist at this level of knowledge. Empires are transparent and pliable. The future is clearly predictable. Influence and the projection of an empire's will are increasingly only questions of what one wants to do--because "if" and "how" are no longer concerns.
Power of the Endless
Might of the Endless

It is not a kind thing to destroy a planet, but it is an easy thing. The pure military might of your empire as projected through its weapons systems is now on par with anything that has ever existed in the history of the galaxy.
Might of the Endless
Theory of Everything

The elusive, golden prize of science and technology, the so-called "theory of everything" is a single physical theory that explains the four fundamental forces: gravity, electromagnetism, and the strong and weak nuclear forces.
Virtual Optimization
ENFER's experience with ruins and artifacts from the Endless and other dead spacefaring species has given it a great number of innovative ideas for technology design and optimization.
Shield of the Hive
Technology discovered in the ancient ruins of a Virtual bioweapon factory is both powerful and deadly. Wisely, a first adaptation is to take this tech and create a powerful defensive shield.
Perfected Operations

Advances in mathematical modeling using sufficiently large data sets have showed that, on a galactic scale, stochastic processes can be shown to be deterministic. Radical improvements in operations management result from these improved forecasting methods.
SPICE

The Special Intergalactic Emissary laws establish guidelines for transferring ships and goods between the Families and their customers. Regardless of civilization or the goods and services in question, the speed of trade and the profit margins all improve.
WEWIN Bill

To colonize the stars profitably some galactic-scale development projects are necessary. To work effectively, these undertakings require the joint efforts of government, the private sector, and the underground economy.
Complete Costing Theories

Algorithms that combine behavioral analysis and activity-based costing give a clear picture of the overall cost to society of a period of anarchy. Once the numbers are clear and the Lumeris see how much money they are wasting, periods of anarchy between governments drop precipitously.
Happiness Theory

You can either call this mass bribery or facilitating the will of the people. Regardless, bureaucratic systems and supportive mass media campaigns come together to make changes of government rapid and relatively painless.
Raid Formation

Accustomed to swarming in ant-like raids, Craver technologists have adapted their ships to mimic these formations. As a result, they are capable of creating defensive perimeters -- or blockades -- around star systems.
Tachyon Physics
A more rigorous theory of tachyon particles underpins the creation of more powerful time-shifting singularities.
Unified Tachyon Theory
Marrying an understanding of quantized gravity, string theory, and tachyon buckyballs permits the creation of vast singularities where the flow of time can be fully arrested.
Unknown Tech
Technology cost reduction link
Unlocks a Technology cost reduction link from Vertical Farming to Genetic Recoding
Unlocks a Technology cost reduction link from Xenobotany to Fluid Nanodynamics
Unlocks a Technology cost reduction link from Multi-Thread Management to Impactless Sites
Unlocks a Technology cost reduction link from [TBD] ???? to Universal Aerodynamics
Unlocks a Technology cost reduction link from [TBD] ???? to [TBD] ????
Required Tech
Discover the first technology in order to be able to research the second technology.
Exclusive Tech
You can only discover one of the two technologies.
Reinforcing Tech
Discover both technologies in order to further your progress toward the next era.
Facilitating Tech
Discover the first technology in order to reduce the cost of the second technology.
Enabling Tech
Discover the first technology in order to unlock the link to buy the second technology.

Ad Astra!

E r a
I
As intelligent beings who once looked up to the stars learn to travel between them, an age of endless discovery begins.
First Contact

E r a
II
No longer content with cataloging the wonders of planets, stars, and systems, the empires of the galaxy seek to understand them -- and each other -- in detail.
Wealth of Worlds

E r a
III
As borders solidify and competition increases, empires start to look within themselves for growth and opportunity.
Tech Like Magic

E r a
IV
Fleets; technologies, populations -- all of these things must be generated in large quantities to improve the standing of an empire with its friends as well as its enemies.
Make Room!

E r a
V
The galaxy, once limitless, now begins to feel crowded as alliances are strained and conflict grows. The infinity of space now feels too small for its inhabitants.
To Rule a Galaxy

E r a
VI
In the end, for better or for worse, the few will impose their will and their vision upon the many.
