Armed with this knowledge, the institute gives precise seed planting instructions to maximize food yields on these planet types.
Farsighted Crops

With receptor technology introduced into agricultural staples, grains, tubers, rices and other crops, can be digitally fed future environmental conditions--thunderstorms, droughts, pest swarms etc.--and then adapt accordingly. Yields increase.
Super Biofuel Factory

A powerhouse of an industrial facility, this biofuel factory can transform excess crops of any hue into extremely efficient fuels. Beets, canes, grains, tubers, whatever, the factory is hungry for vegetative matter of any persuasion. Able to produce fuels of limitless type, the factory provides a great boost for industry when populations have reached their maximum.
Seagrass Petrochemicals

Lumerians have long wondered what to do with the excess seaweeds and other oceanic organic matter that clogs their planetary seas, but new understandings of chemistry now allow key fuels to be created from the raw materials. Industry and the taxman benefit.
Eco Habitats

Who wouldn't want to live in green towers bursting with agricultural goodness? The advent of vertical farming technology has not only revolutionized food production--it has transformed population capacities! Now, head up a couple of levels and grab some root veg, eh?
Skyward Dwellings

Horatio, of course, being more beautiful, more intelligent, and more worthy than other races, should always be afforded the opportunity of living a little closer to the stars. More elevated living arrangements, you might say. These piercing, green spires of modern technology allow greater populations.
Cosmetic Genetics

A sad but true fact: everybody's more willing to live in more crowded conditions when the average good-looking index rises. And with Cosmetic Genetics that becomes totally in reach. Both inter- and intra-species relations improve when everyone is a little closer to physical perfection.
Intensive Cultivation
Work on accelerated evolution of crops combined with genetic modification radically improves food output while increasing pest-resistance.
Xeno-Industrial Infrastructure

A better understanding of alien biospheres and alien workers permits the development of industrial projects that take these into account. By adapting tools, sites, and processes to local environments, large projects become much more efficient.
Mega-Indy Consultancy

Sophons are always happy to glean industrial engineering tips and tricks from their galactic cousins, and with the Mega-Indy Consultancy firm in-system, industrial productivity can skyrocket across a range of planetary conditions. Who says consultants don't earn their keep?
Interplanetary Transport Network

Due to the interaction of gravitational pulls and magnetic fluxes, low-energy paths exist that speed and simplify travel within a system. By also applying advanced magnetics to transport design, this low-cost network facilitates access to the farthest points of the system's limits.
Predictive Logistics

Using advanced computational analysis, the flow of raw materials and manufactured goods can be optimized to an incredibly precise level. The ultimate execution of "just-in-time" commerce across an entire system is a powerful boon to industry.
AI Labor

Far more than the simple application of robotics, advanced computational methods and materials permit the creation of a highly flexible and instantly re-trainable workforce. Flawless, uncomplaining, and efficient, these workers boost both industrial production and R&D.
Hazardous Mining Facility

Somehow the lawyers have enabled such a place to exist. Like the name suggests, this isn't a place to work if you value your eyesight, hearing, limbs, or even your life. On the other hand, maybe you've run up huge debts in other lives, and this is your only option. The pay is lucrative.
Fabrication License

All mass-production facilities across the system must now adhere to strict guidelines regarding the quality of their materials and construction methods. Cowboy outfits producing equipment of questionable quality are forced out-of-business, and the durability of tools, machines, and other manufactured goods increases.
Miners Union

Enabling mine workers of every race to form a union, creates a workforce that is better integrated and more efficient. Miners are healthier, suffer less disputes, and stay in the industry longer. Strategic resource output increases.
Expanded Mines

Utilizing the same technology used to clean gas-giant atmospheres, mining facilities now can be expanded into areas that were previously too toxic to enter without dedicated, cumbersome filtration suits. Output rises.
Mechsuit Quarter

Encouraging a flourishing, creative hub for mechsuit designers to come together and express themselves, the quarter has excellent benefits for mining stations that often require non-machine prospectors for the discovery and exploitation of the most challenging seams. Enter the quarter at your peril though!
Riftborn Miners Corp
Upgrading their robotic shells with patented P.O.W.E.R. Armor, a specialized cadre of Riftborn workers can safely excavate resources from the most deadly and dangerous seams.
Public-private Partnerships

Before any great scientific advances can be found, there must be money to do the research. By setting up a series of long-term agreements between public and private entities, future investments into large-scale, ambitious projects can be assured.
Magnetic Field Generators

These create artificial magnetospheres around planets in order to compensate for the lack of a liquid ferrous core. They provide stable environments on planets that would otherwise be bombarded by radiation.
Optics Research Labs

This is more than simply determining ways to collapse the wave functions of photons or study technologies to bend their paths. Fundamental research into the nature of leptons is part of the Institutes' charter, and discoveries should have great effects on the knowledge of light, gravity, and dark energy.
Graviton-shielded Laboratories

Thanks to the reactive capacities of etched graviton sensors, science develops the capacity to create shielding effects that isolate objects from the effect of gravity-bearing "graviton" particles. Critical space-oriented technologies can now be developed and tested anywhere.
Graviton-shielded Laboratories

Thanks to the reactive capacities of etched graviton sensors, science develops the capacity to create shielding effects that isolate objects from the effect of gravity-bearing "graviton" particles. Critical space-oriented technologies can now be developed and tested anywhere.
Battlefield Archeology
Instruments of warfare, both past and present, are analytically parsed for scientific/creative insights. During wars, scavenge craft can scour battlefield for enemy ordnance to be reverse engineered.
Punctuated Evolution Foundation

The ability to rapidly alter the long-term climate of a planet affords the opportunity to closely study evolutionary processes in the field. By crowdsourcing the energy of the inhabitants and getting them involved in data collection, scientific advances in this important discipline can be accelerated.
F-Reality Institute

Spatial constraints on scientific experiments are a thing of the past as trial areas of any size can now be folded-up and put into scientists' pockets. Care should be taken when unfolding realities as famous Sophon shark researcher, Gulip Fzaktor, will attest.
Xenotourism Agencies

In order to properly tap into the exploding market of alien tourists, a special infrastructure must be put into place. Travel between planets is a simple problem; travel between cultures is something else indeed. In order to effectively provide an interesting destination for aliens, enormous work is required in public infrastructures, hotels, restaurants, spaceports, and--most particularly--toilets.
Careful Sweeping

This term for the tax system, an "in" joke between bureaucrats, indicates that the government is careful about picking up all the Dust it can, regardless of where it is (NP-hard math is required to plot the travel routes of the collectors).
Adaptive Taxation Systems

Traditional taxation systems are often slow to change, and risk generating harmful economic behavior--like increasing savings when consumption is needed. Adaptive taxes, however, change instantaneously not only based on economic trends but according to product or service, and by location. As a result, ideal economic behavior is encouraged while government coffers are filled.
Smart Tax Collection

Utilizing optimized logistics technology, individuals and companies find it much more difficult to siphon off profits into private bank accounts where they would normally be out of reach of government hands. Aside from a few less super space-yachts, society benefits.
Interspecies Cooperative

A financial institution set up with the express purpose of facilitating business between small entrepreneurs of different empires. As well as handling the usual banking services, the Interspecies Cooperative advises on, for example, how a Sophon should approach a Horatio for business (a gift of a mirror is recommended), and vice-versa.
Intergalactic Supermarket
People love to spend money. By providing them with the best place in the universe to do so, you'll become rich faster than you ever thought possible. Especially if your people are happy.
Cube of the Viceroy

The seat of the Riftborn's Grand Viceroy, the Cube is a striking construction that hovers over the system's capital. Reminiscent of the Corozian home dimension, the Cube orchestrates the system's economic affairs, raising Dust yields.
Dust Anti-Trafficking Center

Using reidite-7 in a similar fashion to how radioscopic markers can highlight sites of disease, this center tracks any illegal Dust skimming across the entire trade network. The result? Double Dust income from the trade routes, plus a little extra that scales with the development of the host system. Due to reidite-7’s rarity, together with the need to keep this venture top-secret, the center is a one-stop shop.
Dark Matter Institute

A scientific powerhouse of a research lab to be constructed dozens of kilometers below the planetary crust, no expense will be spared equipping the place with state-of-the-art scintillation detectors. The location should be carefully considered as the lab, guided by the finest minds in your empire, can only be built in one system.
Infinite Supermarkets

With vastly improved methods for selecting, growing, and harvesting foods, it is possible to deliver any known dish or ingredient anywhere within a colonized world. Local markets have essentially become infinitely large.
Solar Security Operations Base

Pirates target trade routes for the same reason bears target salmon runs: easy pickings. As pirates hide out in asteroid fields or gas giant atmospheres, it is incredibly difficult for local law patrols to eradicate the threat given the size of the territory. With this security operations base charging weapons and scanners directly from the energy of a star, however, pirate attacks will disappear and income will rise.
Xhiyun Cartel
Named for the star system where the organization was first created, this agreement between producers allows monopoly pricing on trade goods.
Borer's Guild Bourse

This is an exchange where miners, gemologists, and other rock collectors come from all over the system to trade in their wares. It is under the management of a loose confederation of mining companies, known as the Borer's Guild.
Colonial Rights

A complex question has always arisen around the power of a colonial government to administer its own affairs without too much interference from distant, once-important home worlds. Now that technology has rapidly developed to the point where colonies are autonomous, stable, and productive, most factions tend to adopt a 'hands-off' policy for laws and regulations -- in return for a constant supply of cash.
Center for Holy Tithe

The need of the Vodyani people to extract Essence is seen by some subject populations as a curse. The construction of this religious center, however, provides a place where citizens can contribute Dust, rather than their Essence, to the Protectorate. The matter of finding other citizens, desperate enough to provide a bit of their Essence for some of the collected Dust, is handled far more discreetly.
Wellbeing Foundation

Building on cultural invertics theory, the Wellbeing Foundation can raise population approval levels by organizing and promoting public events that will reflect well on the system leadership. This capacity to shape public opinion scales with the sophistication of the system, as cultural resonance effects between higher and lower order pursuits can be employed.
High Serenity Program

Discovered through a freak accident, particular strains of chlorophyll were found to promote intense feelings of euphoria when inhaled in very precise doses. This program can generate high approval boosts for every peace or alliance treaty that the empire currently enjoys.
Luxuries Lottery

A shameless grab for popularity, the Luxuries Lottery nonetheless is an effective means by which governments can gain their citizens' goodwill. Run by networked machines across the system, for every Luxury Deposit discovered, a monthly lottery brings a glittering windfall to one lucky individual.
Glorification of the Gorgeous

Appreciation of the marvelous is important to Horatio, for how else could he appreciate himself? Once constructed, an annual "Glitter and Gold" celebration is held in this palace of impeccable taste in order to glorify the resplendent bounties of the empire.
Autonomous Administration
The system gains a high degree of autonomy thanks to the ability of newly installed cyborg administrators. The empire can continue expanding without risk to the population's happiness.
National Museum

The empire holds a great store of loot (though we prefer the term "acquired objects"). This museum puts them on display, provides facilities to study them, and reminds others of the reach and power of your empire.
Body Language Institute

Building on breakthrough insights into how social organisms mediate their relationships, the Body Language Institute teaches professionals, politicians, and others, how to use non-verbal channels of communication to improve their abilities of persuasion.
Intergalactic Lectures

Entice celebrated visionaries, entrepreneurs, and social commentators from friendly empires with the lure of small quantities of mind-expanding Dust-9. The gratitude for exposing your system's populations to such high-caliber speakers is repaid with higher Influence levels.
Culture Center
This vast complex of buildings, parks, and recreation facilities celebrates all that is wonderful about your empire: Its strength, its achievements, its influence, and its wealth.
Shaft-to-Shelf System

Using the latest industrial technologies, corporations can set up manufacturing chains that seek resources, design and manufacture products, and deliver them to the customer in a seamless, automated flow.
Multi-Mind Combat

The integration of several "players" into the control systems of ships and mobilized infantry allows not only an enormous increase in available troops, but also permits automated systems to select the best offensive or defensive maneuver from experienced fighters.
Adaptive Fleet Systems

Control systems can be built that have limited abilities to both learn from past experiences and scan briefly into the future. This combination generates "learning" ships that have already gained enormous practical experienced.
Impervious Bunkers
By digging deep and using layers of armor that are by turns hardened, absorptive, and ablative, bunkers can be created that are considered to be almost uncrackable.
Tractable Armaments

A transformative tool for strengthening ground defenses, the invention of sophisticated autonomous construction techniques allows battlefield ordnance to be manufactured on-the-fly. In this way, defenses can be constructed that are responsive to enemy composition and attack patterns.
Integrated Weaponry

Although reluctant to engage in combat before other channels of persuasion have been exhausted, the Unfallen do not shy away from military improvement. Using knowledge of magnetics, arms can now be embedded in Unfallen Seconds for more effective battlefield performance.
Electromagnetic Shield

Better control of varying magnetic flux densities within nanosecond order timescales, means that planetary structures can enjoy more robust defense beneath protective fields. Additionally, when not under attack, these shields shelter troops from any harmful ambient radiation.
Planetary Guard
Utilizing new understandings of the field of magnetics, Unfallen vessels can be launched on orbital trajectories trailing long conducting tendrils that help shield facilities from damaging radiation.
Common Defense

With the creation of online war systems where anyone with reflexes can be a warrior, defensive networks are operated at "red alert" around the clock for no appreciable cost, but with a great bonus in readiness and reactivity.
Big Data Shipyards

Building on Autonomous Construction technology, shipyards are able to integrate data from the empire's fleets--from deep space, from battle, from stellar anomalies--to construct vessels at the absolute cutting-edge of ship design. As a result, new vessels leave the shipyards as if they'd already spent considerable time in the great beyond.
Quantum-damped circuits

A great obstacle to the development of increasingly small integrated circuits is that at small enough chip scales, quantum particle and field effects interfere with the intended operations of the transistors. By using quantum damping technology, however, these parasitic effects can be bled off so the circuits perform as intended at less than five nanometer scales.
Craver Dark Ops

By sending Craver crews on intense, brutal training programs, fleets enjoy elevated experience levels straight out the nest. Keeping the intensity of the training secret from the wider population allows the operations to exist.
Close Cryogenics

This new technology allows two volunteers to share the same cryogenic sleep capsule, providing enormous savings in colonization ship space, production cost, and energy consumption. Techniques for handling "apocalyptic morning breath" are also under study.
Pulvis Production
This installation accelerates production rates via the application of Dust in its many forms--as currency, as complex nanomachinery, and as an extension of willpower.
Workers' Campus

With improved environments around factory sites, Lumerian workers can live on-site in campuses that enjoy good standards of accommodation, theatrical spaces, and, of course, legalized gambling establishments. Buyout costs are reduced, and workers give more back to the economy.
MXBA
Building specialized universities to teach Masters in Xeno-Business Administration provides an enormous boost to efficiency and production in this multi-species universe.
Planet Cracker Factory/Lab

Stretching for hundreds of square kilometers, under normal operation this site is a massive industrial terraforming complex, processing the raw materials of the system. In a period of days, however, the place can be transformed into a vast research lab, the workers seamlessly switching between roles.
Urgent AI Research

The nice thing about having supersmart software running your mining operations is that, should the need arise, you can get your AI algorithms to down tools and put its computational mind to other matters. Like science.
Core Science

Sophons love learning, and there's a whole lot of learning to do deep underground. The good news is that those supersmart AI systems helping to run deep mines can switch their attention to the geology, physics, and magmalicious flows to boost science at the drop of a miner's hat.
Public 3D Printing

By allowing a part of your industrial base to become a large-scale 3D printing service for private commercial initiatives, income for the imperial coffers can be generated. The perfect choice for when you need to convert excess industrial capacity into cold hard Dust. Just keep an eye out for outrageous 3D designs....
Emergency Labor Policy

Persuading the majority of your system to give up their free time and work instead is no easy feat. It takes deep insight into alien psychologies, motivational tricks, and some really snappy slogans. When you do have this capacity though, Dust revenues--at the expense of industrial output--can become insane. Make Everything Great Again!
Political Theater
Manufacturing a Lumerian scandal that sees system-wide industrial output plummet to zero is a risky business, but the additional revenues generated by the rapt population can be worth it.
Fabricated Forces
Dedicating all industrial output towards the construction of battlefield actors may delay infrastructure development, but it does permit the rapid enhancement of military forces.
Endless Research Park and EndlessWorld

Built near the remains of an Endless outpost, this giant industrial park will aid in exploiting and understanding galactic history. As visitors and scholars come to see it, and as new historical events and objects are discovered, it creates enormous wealth and knowledge for its builders. There is also a giant entertainment complex connected to it, EndlessWorld!, where you can visit AR-augmented ruins and see the galaxy as the Endless did.
Intergalactic Technology Center (ITER)

This vast complex of laboratories, classrooms and offices is unique in the galaxy for bringing together experts and researchers to work together on challenging scientific and technological issues. A technological marvel in itself, the building promises enormous gains in scientific knowledge as well as practical applications.
Trade Clearing Bureau

In order to apply necessary controls and regulations to the activities of the innumerable financial and commodities market, a giant, intergalactic, quantum-connected central office must be built to ensure that trades are executed as fairly, quickly, and legally as possible. One advantage is that whoever controls the center has the freedom to levy and determine taxes; a necessary decision to counter-act the cost of the construction.
Gives the ability to set and collect marketplace taxes as well as learn insider information regarding the identity of the buyers and sellers.
Ministry of Truth

This vast complex is the communications center for the entire empire. All transmissions pass through these buildings, where messages and broadcasts are carefully managed to provide the correct view of current events. Interviews with war heroes and tales of glorious victories are disseminated freely; any indication that battles are going poorly or that the populace is suffering are viewed as seditious lies.
Industrialist Propaganda
Progressively increases the support of the Industrialist political ideology
Scientist Propaganda
Progressively increases the support of the Scientist political ideology
Pacifist Propaganda
Progressively increases the support of the Pacifist political ideology
Ecologist Propaganda
Progressively increases the support of the Ecologist political ideology
Religious Propaganda
Progressively increases the support of the Religious political ideology
Alms For Essence

Most souls give their essence freely, understanding they are contributing to a higher glory in their sacrifice. The Church of the Virtual Saints, however, is a lively religion and its hunger for essence is insatiable. The sacrifices alone are often never enough. Sometimes it is necessary to offer incentives to the craven, the greedy, and the weak. So we do.
Holy Proliferation

Essence is the lifeblood of our civilization, the beating heart of the Church of the Virtual Saint, and a whispered echo of ancient eras when our Endless elders sailed the Heavens. It gives us inspiration and strength, but perhaps the most vital use of essence comes from the sacred act of concord, when we immerse empty Cloths in its vitality. Through such acts are our congregations swelled.
+1 #FFFFFF#[population]#REVERT# from Essence
Militarist Propaganda
Progressively increases the support of the Militarist political ideology
Global Propaganda
Attracts all population but is less efficient than specialized propaganda
Trade Company HQ
Headquarters
Here is where it all starts. The offices, the shipping docks, the computer systems, the meeting rooms, the lounges, and, depending on the culture, the dungeons of an intergalactic conglomerate.
Trade Company Subsidiary
Subsidiary

Order the red ribbon, call some local dignitaries--the company is expanding into new territories. Aside from more interesting end-of-year parties, this subsidiary branch will open up a new trade route between this system and all the company HQ systems.
Academy Embassy

Constructed to very exacting--and highly confidential--plans relayed direct from the Academy, this embassy enables the legendary outfit to gain an administrative foothold in your empire. The purpose? To monitor your empire's readiness for their Heroes. Heroes such as the brilliant maverick Krak "Cubed" Bleis, who expect certain standards of their employers.
Chain Gang Program

The watching state is the empowered state. Citizens who are caught engaging in illicit activities are able to commute their sentences and avoid criminal records by immediately enlisting into the military. Unsurprisingly, most welcome the opportunity.
Military Penance

With abundant energy available, the Church is able to power an army of simple machines to watch over the flock. Since any wrongdoing by followers risks heavy punishment, many opt to forgo a Church trial and enroll direct into the Vodyani's crusading military.
Evacuate System

Sometimes things don't work out, and on a scale too big to ignore them. You have the choice to raze all signs of civilization from the entire system, including inhabitants. It's an ugly-but-necessary slash and burn on a planetary scale.
Vacate System

Sometimes things don't work out, but in this case you get to recoup some of your investment. Before you raze all signs of civilization from the entire system, including inhabitants, you can sell off everything of value and construct a colony ship. It's still slash and burn, but civilized-like.
Solar Exploitation

Now that science and technology can protect industrial platforms from the incredible radiation of solar bodies, these industrial bases can be built that extract minerals and energy directly from solar bodies.
Exotic Rations

Technology learned in fields such as miniaturization, pressurization, and refrigeration permits the development of highly customized and incredibly delicious standardized rations. As military grub now rivals starred restaurants for flavor and presentation, a surprisingly wide range of citizens come to sign up.
Patriot Pills Plant

Advances in crop bioengineering permit a wide range of useful applications. Not only can consumers be healthier and happier, but with the careful inclusion of certain psychoactive molecules the entire population can become more patriotic and devoted to their nation.
Genetic Alteration Lab
One of the great achievements of Horatio science, this site is used to transform the ugly into the beautiful, and when possible improve and advance the Horatio genetic code.
Machine Embodiment

Creating the robotic carapaces for Riftborn to inhabit is only one half of the assembly line process that allows Riftborn to exist in the Endless universe. The second, more difficult, aspect is the transference of a Riftborn consciousness into the shell.
Site of Endless Veneration

Part library, part museum, part research center, part monument. This is a massive undertaking; the construction of an edifice that gathers together knowledge, beauty, faith, and engineering into a single giant complex to venerate the Endless.
Obelisks of All Space-Time

It is difficult to explain structures that encompass everything. They contain infinite computing power that does not simply record what has happened and what is happening, but do it on the level of particles and waves in perfect synchronization. These titanic structures contain all knowledge, all history, and the understanding of how to perfectly develop, use, and project all power. You hold the ability to create or destroy anything living or non-living, anywhere in the galaxy, instantaneously. Energy and materials are infinite for you, and it is likely that soon you will be able to create and manipulate time itself...
Dilation Singularity
Slow the flow of time in the chosen system.
Compression Singularity
Accelerate the flow of time in the chosen system.
Rip Singularity
Jump back to an earlier time in the chosen system.
Stasis Singularity
Stop the flow of time in the chosen system.
Fold Singularity
Jump forward to a later time in the chosen system.
Zelevas Incarnate

In reality, a massive server farm complex housing both immense computing power and the engineers required to run such a site, for the citizens of the system, the experience is very different. Combing augmented-reality and mood capture tech, each patriot can enjoy a daily visit from a breathtakingly lifelike facsimile of Emperor Zelevas himself that captures his current, usually unsatisfied, feelings. Productivity rockets.
Cathedral of the Swarm

An enormous sky-spanning structure riddled with a hundred-thousand chambers, the Cathedral of the Swarm is where Cravers congregate to see, hear--and feel--the legendary deeds carried out by their fleet-bound Craver siblings scattered across the galaxy. The visions of destruction wrought and the taste of blood spilt, rile the watchers into a frenzy of ecstasy.
Scienceganza

A regular system-wide celebration of all things science, manifested in an explosion of festivals, live demonstrations, celebrity scientist events, quizzes, and crazy experiments that may well involve the loss of dignity and more. The happier the population, the greater the scientific benefit!
Mantle of Unity

Grown out of the space-spearing tendrils that lead back to the Heart, the Mantle of Unity is an overground root system that cocoons the entire planet in thick and gnarled rhizomes. Tall as the largest Third, the roots pulse with the Heart's calming presence, creating feelings of verve and zeal in the population.
Spire of the Ordained

Constructed in the system's seat of power, the Spire of the Ordained is a bespoke structure built with the express purpose of aiding the assigned Vodyani Saint in their piety. Dungeons, interrogation chambers, grand auditoriums, secret passages, and a dais at the pinnacle all feature. Saints relish the learning such an assignation gives.
The White Market

Black markets are generally sordid, grubby Dust-making endeavors on the margins of society, always under threat of closure. The White Market, by contrast, hides in plain sight, siphoning off wealth of all varieties from peaceful trading empires. It is the magnificent epitome of market capitalism, where the loser is the other.
Tower of Temporal Paradox

Overseen by a cadre of High Custodians chosen by the Grand Viceroy itself, the Tower of Temporal Paradox is a secretive Riftborn military research facility that utilizes timeloops and other temporal anomalies to cheat the laws of physics and produce Dust from nothing. The accidents are often quite horrific.
Moonbase Alpha

Exploitation of a lunar body can provide many advantages – a site for inexpensive shipbuilding and repair, a waystation to and from asteroid mines, and an excellent base for scientific observation and analysis.
Sacred Harvest

More a rite than a construction, this event accepts the voluntary sacrifice of a Guardian in order to improve the morale of the system population. Full of the sonorous language of the Unfallen, ancient rites of fire, and clouds of smoke and Dust, it is as impressive and moving as it is encouraging and renewing. Fire is present as a symbol both of death and life, and Dust, like fumes, uplifts and invigorates the population.
Guardian Harvest

A long and exacting process, this event requires the voluntary sacrifice of a Guardian population. Though it is accessible to those who are less in tune with Unfallen culture and the lore of ancient peoples, it is more difficult to execute and requires more time. The final result, however, is a renewing and encouraging sense of hope and confidence for the inhabitants of the system
Stellar Possibilities
Spread the word! Gain a growth bonus on this Outpost for every System you control.
Finding Frontiers
Is civilization boring? There's a new frontier next door. Gain a growth bonus from adjacent colonized Systems.
People and Products
What's in those containers? Gain a growth bonus from each Trade Route crossing the System.
Send More Money
Funnel growth from your Home System to this Outpost.
Neighborly Sabotage
Reduce the growth of another empire on a competing planet of this System.
Greener Grass
It's better over here! Gain a growth bonus from the Outposts of your opponents in this System.
Local Integration
Now that they are determined to survive in this galaxy, the Riftborn find it acceptable to redirect other civilizations into their Outpost colonization efforts.
Clever Colonists
Give your Outpost a growth boost by using Eden Incense Boosters.
Complacent Colonists
With no worries, being happy, the Outpost gains a growth boost from Transvine.
All That Glitters
A good boost of Dark Glitter boosts Outpost growth, as the place appears secure and stable.
Superspuds!
Use Superspud boosters to make everybody happy and healthy, giving a boost to Outpost growth.
Farmers and Fields
Using its Food to fuel efforts to lure to the hungry, the Outpost gains a growth bonus.
Builders and Bricks
Summon those looking for jobs, and gain a boost in growth based on the Industry of the Outpost.
Merchants and Money
Who can ignore the lure of Dust? Boost the Outpost growth based on its Dust value.
Local Magic
Slowly mastering the intricacies of Dust, the Riftborn can use some of its less known properties to increase the speed with which they generate outpost population.
Talent and Tech
A scientific polestar for the curious, this boosts the growth of the Outpost based on its Science value.
Local Acceleration
By manipulating the fourth dimension (and bits of the fifth), the Riftborn accelerate the Outpost production speed.
Freehold Fanfare
By marketing the possibility to start over with space, resources, and healthy subsidies, you can double the migration rate from the planet that provides colonists.
+100% [foodColored] sent to Outpost
Outpost Press Gang
Outpost Fecundity
Outpost Attraction
Outpost Actions
Outpost Support
Outpost Redirect
Outpost Transfer
Sophonic Rampart
ENFER's lessons, though worrisome, have brought great knowledge in security systems that efficiently improve your defenses.
Intra-galactic Relays
An improved network of transmitters increases the signal range and clarity for your Propaganda.
Hive Hall
This is the strange name for a building that effectively integrates the leadership into the Hive, removing the upkeep cost for any Hero assigned as System governor.
No upkeep costs for assigned Heroes in this System
Synchronous Hive

Using Virtual technologies that project moods and feelings, members of a Craver society can be induced to share general feelings--of well-being, stress, or aggressiveness. Regardless of the emotions generated, there is great advantage in having members of a hive feel them together.
Signal Seeker
Enhancing the Hive's ability to detect and decrypt signals increases the visibility of fleets.
Improves Fleet Vision Can be built only on Minor Civilization's Home Systems
Feeding Pits
Other species of the galaxy turn away in horror when they hear of these places. This is where the prisoners and slaves of the Cravers are converted into nutrients that don't fight back.
Obelisk of Remembrance

This great pillar in memory both of Hoce's sacrifice and Kyros's destruction is made of the most valuable materials currently known. It should stand as a memorial until the heat death of the universe.
Culture Jam Centers

By instituting intergalactic challenges for all sorts of creative efforts--art, design, music, extreme experiments--the Sophon leadership turns restless youth into engaged participants in Sophon culture.
Whapster

The expense is enormous, and the number of individual contracts to be negotiated is in the millions. Finally, however, a service is created that streams any form of entertainment to any receiving platform in any format, anywhere, for free. There is great rejoicing.
Black Tax Authority

As the underground and unofficial or "black" economy of the Lumerians is generally larger than the official and declared economy, any levy that effectively both legalizes and taxes those businesses is going to generate a lot of income.
Military Buyout
By channeling extra Dust resources into specialized suits tailored for military garb, manpower replenishment rates can be temporarily boosted at the expense of Dust.
+500 [manPower] on Empire
Dust Oracular

A dedicated arm of the Families whereby the labors of Lumeris scientists are temporarily co-opted to persuade the population of the vital need to share their Dust wealth more generously. Otherwise known as brain-washing the populace.
All [scienceColored] is consumed 50% of [scienceColored] is converted into [dustColored]
Dust Excursion

Sending swathes of the local population into the bowels of the planets for Dust pilgrimages where they may meditate on the sanctity of money may temporarily slash diplomatic leverage, but the increase in Dust yields can be worth it.
All [prestigeColored] is consumed 100% of [prestigeColored] is converted into [dustColored]
Capitalist Frenzy

For the duration of the sacred rite of Capitalist Frenzy, all Lumeris citizens save for those in critical industries are expected to down their tools and dedicate their time to Dust production in whatever way is best for their circumstances.
All [industryColored] is consumed 50% of [industryColored] is converted into [dustColored]
Systemic Oratory

In order to enlighten the inhabitants of the system and acculturate them to the Vodyani faith and lifestyle, a permanent system-wide broadcast infrastructure is built to coordinate and enforce the prayers and rituals of billions of citizens.
Pool of Holy Vigor
The process of creating a new Vodyani soul from the Essence of lesser beings is made easier here through extreme devotion and improved technology.
Academy Annex

While the stories of the Heretic cause concern among your people, the creation of a local annex of the Academy can go a great distance to showing them the truths--and the many layers of shadow--surrounding his history.
Academy of Virtual Purity

Untrustworthy and heretical, the Academy as it stood was a breeding ground for heresy and violence. This new Academy will be not only a center of devotion and study, but a vigilant outpost seeking to uncover further lies and rebels stained by the Heretic's discourse.
Ancillary Academy
As the site of the original Academy has become unusable, this adjunct version of the original is made to contain as much of its teachings and knowledge as can be collected.
+5% on [FIDSI] on System with Governor
Sci-Fi Design School
Create a dedicated space of learning where talented science fiction writers can come together and study how the products of their imagination can be used to design whole new industries.
Who's Yuri?

A gameshow named after the extremely scientifically-illiterate Yuri Palin, a man who decided to eat frozen oxygen on the outpost world of Mari VII, thinking it would grant him the ability to walk across the airless world unaided. Every week, the show now seeks to discover the stupidest individual in the system. Seeking to avoid the shame, the population has never been more scientifically informed.
Mount of Zelevas

The day you, Emperor Zelevas, decided to remain leader of this great Empire to you dying breath will be celebrated for eternity by the construction of a fitting monument that will inspire the entire system's population to greater heights.
Journey to the Stars

A grand museum that hails and explores the Mezari's ancient interstellar journey across the stars. See what life was like on a generation ship! Learn the ingenious science our ancestors used! Rejoice in the history of our race!
+2 [happinessColored] per Science Construction on Systems
Crafted Nutrition Plant

This glorious work of agro-industry can manufacture dietary supplements tailored to an individual's specific DNA sequence. However, due to issues of cost and complexity, it simply churns out nutritional products that are only useful for Horatio.
Cultural Apogee Center

As Horatio--all Horatio--are convinced that their level of intelligence, sophistication, and culture is the greatest in the galaxy, they have planned a center to prove it. Here, Horatio talents in the arts and social sciences are collected, perfected, packaged and broadcast to the rest of the galaxy.
Artisanal Excellence Museum

It is easy to manipulate a population as vain as the Horatio. This museum, with exhibits and broadcasts that publicize the cleverest and most efficient ideas for industry and production, receives regular visits from the emperor and is often praised in his speeches. As a result, every Horatio is dying to be featured in it--and productivity increases dramatically.
Nanocuisine Plant

The powers of Dust, Endless technology, and Horatio genius come together with the invention of this gorgeous facility. The factory takes in almost any raw food ingredient and turns it into a dish that is the color, flavor, scent, appearance, and temperature of your choice.
The Horatio Channel
What could possibly be more interesting or beautiful than a full-time channel dedicated to the most perfect person in galaxy? Reality TV meets really big egos in this gorgeous spectacle.
HyperHelix Dynamo
A surprise discovery based on the natural properties of Hyperium and the helix shape of DNA, this form of energy generation powers far more sites far more efficiently than previous energy sources.
Bespoke Architecture
Riftborn structures are generally cold and clinical to outside observers. With this improvement, minor civilizations can enjoy more relaxing surroundings tailored to their own culture.
Sensory Deprivation Resthouse

The Riftborn may not be able to experience the true calm of home, but this resthouse allows them the next best thing. Hanging in suspension tanks where all sights, sounds, smells, and sensations are minimized, the Riftborn mind can drift--and dream of Coroz.
Machine Embodiment

Creating the robotic carapaces for Riftborn to inhabit is only one half of the assembly line process that allows Riftborn to exist in the Endless universe. The second, more difficult, aspect is the transference of a Riftborn consciousness into the shell.
Fabricated Forces
Dedicating all industrial output towards the construction of battlefield actors may delay infrastructure development, but it does permit the rapid enhancement of military forces.
Machine Embodiment

Creating the robotic carapaces for Riftborn to inhabit is only one half of the assembly line process that allows Riftborn to exist in the Endless universe. The second, more difficult, aspect is the transference of a Riftborn consciousness into the shell.
Fabricated Forces
Dedicating all industrial output towards the construction of battlefield actors may delay infrastructure development, but it does permit the rapid enhancement of military forces.
Center of Light and Life
A symbol of the Unfallen's strive for harmony with Others, this center brings together biological, chemical, and anthropological studies of alien peoples.
Harmony of the Heart

The Unfallen view this as an intergalactic center where all peoples are invited to come and learn about each others' cultures and openly share experiences. Their empires reflect the Unfallen conviction that knowledge brings appreciation and understanding.
Gamma Analysis Platforms

These centers for the study and capture of gamma energy must be built above planetary atmospheres, which absorb gamma rays. As gamma rays—and particularly those emitted by astronomical anomalies—are by far the most powerful naturally occurring form of radiation, these centers provide rare opportunities to advance scientific knowledge. If their actions are coordinated, they could also send a directed pulse to a neutron star and briefly destabilize its powerful magnetic field.
Honeycomb Scope

Reverse engineering the Endless scope discovered at a dig site proved a fruitful endeavor. With the underlying principles now well understood, the honeycomb-like structure can now be constructed in any system, greatly increasing that system's ability to survey the surrounding heavens. Engineers claim that the scope is so powerful, it can be used to read the serial numbers of equipment on nearby moons.
The Analytical Engine

Thought to rely on quantum-entanglement effects for its function, the Analytical Engine is a vast, one-off, piece of Endless technology the size of a small town. Utilizing remote sensors on expedition vessels, the Engine somehow instantaneously extracts valuable Dust-production data from any explored curiosity sites, supplementing Dust production in the system where the Engine resides.
+1 [dustColored] on System per Curiosity ever discovered
Sim Camp

A mix of technologies, processes, and concepts go into creating this military training camp that can double-up as a source of industrial production. The essential idea is that military personnel can undertake normal training drills, while, unbeknownst to themselves, they are simultaneously giving their labor to industrial projects. By using bespoke scanners plus AR tech, for example, an apparent search-and-rescue exercise, could at the same time be an industrial surveying expedition.
Stim City

If you have a luxury deposit in-system, you're in luck. Endless blueprints discovered at a recent dig site, give precise details of how freshly excavated luxuries can be used as natural stimulants that "attack" the pleasure centers of the brain. By covertly deploying this tech in a system's "entertainment capital", the entire system population can enjoy a happier, more approving, frame-of-mind.
The Vault of Governance

An automated learning facility, thought constructed by the Concrete Endless in their efforts to create "super defenders" to help stave off Virtual attacks, the Vault of Governance helps Governor Heroes to more swiftly integrate their administrative experiences. Heroes report that the accelerated learning process is akin to taking an intense rollercoaster ride while under the influence of pharmaceutical stimulation of the "upper" variety. Not for mere mortals.
The Rejuvenation Maze

Displaying the usual hallmarks of Endless engineering, this orbital structure has been given the name The Rejuvenation Maze on account of its ability to repair vessels by unknown means. Sadly, this understanding didn't come without a price, and several crews lost their lives before researchers realized that any ships sent into the maze must be unmanned. Now ships are auto-piloted on an entry vector, whereupon powerful electromagnetic fields feed the vessel into the hidden interior. Tracking data has revealed that ships travel a complex route through the structure, but what happens along the way largely remains a mystery.
+20% Health Regeneration ratio on Ships in orbit or in the hangar
Nanohaze Defenses

Formed from a pool of self-replicating nano-machines, these miniature robots can quickly adjust battlefield conditions to draw out encounters. Much more than simply spraying mist that many battlefield actors can filter out, nanohaze defenses trick the enemy with many different optical illusions that give the impression of a fluid, dangerous environment.
Lunar Surveillance Station

Built from Endless plans found in an ancient dig site, a lunar surveillance station can greatly boost scientific progress in systems containing moons. As well as being perfect for investigating gravity, lunar sites offer excellent conditions for several other scientific fields, including deep space observation, organic decay, group psychology, and materials science.
Virtual Dustylizer

A bleak remnant of the Virtual/Concrete Dust wars that shattered the galaxy all those eons ago, Virtual Dustylizers were created by the Virtual Endless in their desire to not only decimate their Concrete siblings, but also to turn them into something useful upon death. Sacrifice population and gain some true blood money.
Endless Archive

With the gripping tale of the galaxy's most significant culture contained in its interactive exhibitions, the Endless Archive is not only a fantastic day out for any visitor, it is also a source of enormous pride for the inhabitants of the system. With such a prestigious monument in-system, other Empires will find it that much harder to culturally assimilate the system.
System Development Level
This effect is dictated by your System level
Level 1 Upgrade
The Ark is austere yet functional.
Level 2 Modernization
Basic comforts grace the Ark.
Level 3 Modernization
A shining beacon of an Ark, comfortable and capable.
Level 4 Modernization
The pinnacle of sophistication, this Ark is a glorious seat of Vodyani power.
Level 1 Upgrade (Base)
Settlements across the system are functional but isolated.
Level 2 Modernization
System infrastructure is robust and interconnected.
Level 3 Modernization
A mature system, where advanced infrastructure underpins a thriving culture.
Level 4 Modernization
Fully developed, these systems are powerful players in the galactic empire.
Outpost
A basic settlement which can progressively grow into a fully settled world.
The system has no automation and remains under your full control
Evolved Soils

Using lessons from hardy strains of bacteria and extremophilic eukaryotes, basic soil biology can be changed to improve nutrition and waste cycles. These changes will, however, propagate planet-wide over time.
Alien Grafting

A first step in creating hardy, sustainable (and non-toxic) local crops is to integrate known genomes and physiological adaptations into alien ecologies. Using advanced biochemical techniques, combinatorial genetics of known and alien plant types, new and relatively harmless produced can be joined.
Aquaculture Dome

By taking advantage of water-borne nanites that can purify and enrich underwater ecologies, these "aquatic greenhouses" allow populations of any size to grow super yields of algae, mollusks, fish, and other seafood. These domes are especially beneficial on planets that already contain plenty of life.
Industrial Zones

Every new planet has its own specificities and challenges. Before great leaps can be made in exploiting a planet's resources, the first step is to adapt known and reliable industrial processes to the new environment. By overcoming challenges in transport, energy, and finance, a firm base for development can be created.
Geo-industrial Plants

These vast complexes serve a number of critical industrial functions: Production of geothermal energy; mining of planetary cores for specialized materials; advanced materials and geological research; advanced study of plate tectonics.
3D Replication Plants

It was a large and complicated engineering task, but the creation of a planet-wide system of smart materials plus improved logistics has brought this world to the point where any industrial object can be 'printed' in a local factory. While the bonus to production is obvious, the complexity of the infrastructure becomes a dominant factor in the economy.
Exoscience Stations

Data is the lifeblood of science. As new planets are discovered, field scientists set up systems to measure and analyze the biology, geology, and meteorology of the planet and its atmosphere. Collecting, filtering and exploiting this information is a first and critical step.
Citizen Science

Inspired by the bonds between dry mathematical models, historical records, and the lived experience of past or future races, planetary populations are happy to partake in Citizen Science programs. These schemes are especially effective at generating Science in colder climes, where many more artefacts of the past are likely to have survived.
Global Tech Park

A majority of the planet has been converted into an enormous research institute. Relatively non-polluting, high margin, and education-intensive, it draws companies and agencies to develop the next generation of galaxy-changing technologies. In addition, telepathics can be either augmented or diminished to improve group brainstorming or individual concentration. The cost of the infrastructure is high, however, and other industrial development is necessarily minimized.
Colonial Exchange

Founding a colony is both complex and expensive. Using funds and technology from the government and investors, skills from the colonists, and raw materials from the planet, a system must be created to handle investments, loans, salaries, project finance... and taxes.
Atemporal Finance

The discovery of transport via faster-than-light travel and wormholes has added complexity to simple calculations of Net Present Value and rates of return. The development of Atemporal Finance is a new branch of finance, governing cases where space is a variable as important as time.
Finance Commission

In order to effectively execute trade and finance in a relativistic frame of reference, new regulatory systems and laws are required in order to control some of the new and unexpected effects of space-time on traditional investment structures. A major agency has been set up, and as it attracts financial institutions, lobbyists, economists, and speculators, it begins to have a major effect on the planet's development.
SPIN Project

The Scrupulous Politics In the News project uses various forms of government control--audits and investigations as well as access to information, politicians and sites--to ensure that only the most fair and balanced image of the government is made public.
Edenization

This program integrates marketing, propaganda, urban planning, and theme park design into a single project. Turning a planet into a place perceived as an "ideal" of modern living creates appreciation, and even jealousy, in other peoples and planets.
Bio-Enhancement Facility

In this state-of-the-art complex, a planetary-wide program of mental enhancement can be rolled out for the entire population. Liquid nanites with sophisticated control algorithms and delicate receptors can be injected straight into the cerebral cortex via the spinal cord, offering synaptic cleaning services. Farsighted thinking is enhanced, resulting in better public discourse, and a more influential population.
Slag and Sludge Center

In any refining or extraction process a certain percentage of the end product necessarily ends up as waste due to declining yields and increasing costs required to extract and purify it. With these centers, even infinitesimal amounts of precious materials can be recovered and exploited.
Self-Mining NPO
These technological wonders are rockets that are fired to Near Planetary Objects. Once landed, they build and operate autonomous mining operations, sending the refined ores back to their home base.
{0}: Colony
Colonize Arctic

The ability to colonize Arctic-type planets is largely thanks to the invention of graviton-powered thermal tech. Without this tech, the first colonists tasked with terraforming these harsh worlds, would undoubtedly freeze or starve to death. And that's never a strong foundation for conquering any planet.
Colonize Arid

Utilizing evaporation suppression tech that spun-off from developing warp insights is vital for building life-sustaining systems on arid worlds. With water more easily kept in its liquid form, death from dehydration becomes unlikely rather than expected. Don't start having any pool parties yet though.
Colonize Barren

Barren planets lack atmospheres, often for excellent astronomical or gravitational reasons. By utilizing insights into non-baryonics to create controlled plasma domes around large areas of a planet or even entire planetoids, artificial atmospheres can be created and traditional colonization can begin.
Colonize Desert

Desert ecosystems are famous for their fragility. With low water levels, delicate soils, and intricate (and easily upset) food chains, they are difficult to reliably and sustainably develop. In fact, their colonization would not be practical without a greatly improved understanding of how to retain water.
Colonize Jungle

As they teem with animal and plant life, Jungle-type planets can be difficult to colonize. Medical supplies are critical to deal with the plethora of exotic fungi, bacteria, poisons, secretions, pollens, spores, and, of course, teeth and claws.
Colonize Monsoon

Surviving the mighty rainstorms that can wrack Monsoon-type worlds might be thought the biggest challenge to colonizing these planets, but there are other challenges like dealing with the microbial disease that can spring from vast flooded plains.
Colonize Lava

For obvious reasons this planet type is nicknamed "Shake-and-Bake". Due to their active, volcanic characteristics and excitingly lively plate tectonics, the major hurdle to colonizing Lava-type planets is the creation of sufficiently robust and tremor-resistant buildings and public infrastructures. That are, of course, also fireproof.
Colonize Ash

Attempts to colonize Ash-type planets without some form of topological control has a long history of failure. Life-sustaining habitats desiccating to the point of death and greenhouses succumbing to irreversible desertification were not unknown. Fortunately, with improved technologies these problems are a thing of the past.
Colonize Ocean

Generally rich in life and highly prized for colonization, Ocean-type planets present two major problems: The first is developing a stable aquaculture infrastructure that provides all needed nutrients. The second is dealing with the unimaginably powerful storms and waves that can traverse the entire world with no land to inhibit them.
Colonize Terran

The greatest risk to colonizing Terran-type planets is taking their apparently 'friendly' ecosystems for granted. Rigorous scientific testing and analysis are required to study the atmosphere, food chains, proteins, and carbon and nitrogen cycles. In spite of their apparent compatibility, they can be full of rude surprises.
Colonize Tundra

Improvement of the system by which sap moves through weather-resistant plants results in the creation of crop species that can survive harsh weather via freezing and thawing. This opens up many opportunities for colonizing previously uninhabitable areas.
Colonize Steppes

Crops. It's all about the crops on Steppes-type planets. Or, rather the lack of crops. The grasses may look innocuous, but over the ages they have strangled each and every challenger. Colonists' crops don't stand a chance, unless time and money is invested into adapting and engineering new forms of agriculture.
Colonize Snow

The discovery of wave function powered energy sources provides a basic source of power on cold, wet planets. They can be further improved to self-evolve in order to better adapt to extreme conditions such as snowstorm-rich biomes.
Colonize Savannah

Occasional megafauna can make colonizing Savannah-type planets a difficult endeavor--no one likes to deal with aggressive beasts with sharpened claws, tails, talons, or unknown appendages before breakfast, after all--but by and large these worlds are easy ones on which to plant roots.
Colonize Mediterranean

Though objectively beautiful, the environment of Mediterranean-type planets can be harsh. Soil is often poor, rainfall limited, and summers harsh. Adaptation of both shelter and agriculture is required to survive in this relatively austere biome.
Colonize Boreal

Cold and moist, Boreal-type worlds provide challenges for settlers and industries that are often seduced by clever marketing brochures whose photos were taken in summer. Though potentially welcoming and productive, much of the year the environment is forbidding and must be treated with caution.
Colonize Forest
Provided your potential colonists aren't dendrophobic (afraid of trees), Forest-type worlds with their wealth of food and fuel will provide little trouble for settlers.
Colonize Toxic

Colonization of Toxic-type planets relies on inventions that master the various systems needed for filtration and drainage, as deadly chemicals and radiation are often abundant in the atmosphere and soil. The environments are deadly and unforgiving if these processes are not executed perfectly.
Colonize Ice

Cold and surprisingly dry in spite of their ice sheath, Ice-type planets can be forbidding to colonize. Often windswept and hostile, few habitats are sustainable unless they are embedded within the frozen surface of the planet and heavily insulated.
Colonize Atoll

A great difficulty of colonizing Atoll-type planets comes from the profusion of microbial life found in and around coral reefs, which can have devastating consequences for non-native species. Carefully monitoring water conditions and controlling microbial blooms is necessary for these planets whose biodiversity is largely marine.
Colonize Ice Giant (Frozen)

Essentially giant balls of supercooled elements, these planets generally consist of oxygen, carbon, nitrogen, and sulfur. Temperatures in the upper atmosphere can drop as low as -200°C. As a result, colonization requires technologies to draw heat from the planet's core.
Colonize Ammonia Giant (Cold)
As unpleasant an environment as one could imagine, these very cold gas giants (below -120°C) have atmospheres primarily made of ammonia. Maintaining sealed habitats is a must for colonization.
Colonize Vapor Giant (Temperate)

The clouds in this type of gas giant, whose temperatures range from -100°Cto -20°C, tend to be made up of water vapor. The key risks for colonization are focused on the extremes of gravity rather than a poisonous atmosphere.
Colonize Cloudless Giant (Warm)

Gas giants of this type (temperatures from 80°C to over 500°C) typically lack the atmospheric chemicals to create clouds. Hot and cloudless, colonization of these planets demands protection from both gravitation and radiation.
Colonize Alkali Giant (Hot)

These gas giants, with atmospheres typically including carbon monoxide, sodium, and potassium, are hellish by any reasonable non-Deuyivan standards. Extreme temperatures and extremely poisonous atmospheres make colonization a challenge.
Colonize Silicate Giant (Burning)

With temperatures at greater than 1100°C, the "gas" in these atmospheres is typically iron and silicate grains. Any sort of exploration or exploitation of these planets, much less colonization, is a major challenge.
Savannah > Monsoon
Monsoon planets produce less Science than Savannah ones, but their output of all other basic resources is increased.
Study Ruins
Your team of experts is exploring the mysterious ruins, seeking information, answers, and even treasures.
Study Atmosphere
Unusual chemical and gravitational elements make the atmosphere of this planet strange and unique.
Study Life Forms
The moving shapes on the scanners seem to be organized. New friends, new threats, or something entirely different?
Study Distress Signal
Whoever sent this signal is lucky you finally picked it up. But are you lucky as well?
Study Geology
You have had unusual readings from the crust and upper geologic layers of the planet. Is it wealth, knowledge, or danger?
Reduced Ice-10

A rare form of ice that is caused by water crystallizing under high pressures, Ice-10 is interesting for its thermodynamic properties. A concerted effort by the planet's engineers has led to a lessening of its negative effects.
Reduced Permanent Monsoon
Once a very wet and very difficult environment, a concerted effort to partially terraform the planet has lessened the intensity of the winds and storms.
Reduced Metallic Waters
Almost dirt-free, the hard, gleaming surface of this planet used to make agriculture difficult and potentially poisonous. Recent improvements in soil development, however, have eased the problem.
Reduced Aurora Waves

The gleaming, multi-colored auroras that once caused such headaches have been partially tamed by magnetic shielding. Fortunately, their beauty remains even though their negative effects have been reduced.
Reduced Atmospheric Density
While the atmosphere of this planet remains heavy with combusted organic compounds, efforts to purify and remove a large part of these pollutants have resulted in a less problematic environment.
Reduced Psychoactive Air

With an atmosphere that was once saturated by complex chemical compounds, life on this planet was challenging. Application of terraforming technologies, however, has rendered the effects of the chemicals less intense.
Reduced Geothermic Activity
Applying enormous amounts of energy and grappling with gravitational alterations, the previously uncontrollable geothermic activity of the planet is now somewhat less intense.
Reduced Seismic Activity
By manipulating the magnetic core, stabilizing continental drift, and improving construction techniques, the problems in daily life caused by seismic activity have been notably reduced.
Reduced Long Season

While the long orbital ellipse remains a fact of life, the application of terraforming sciences, advanced architecture, and improved agriculture has changed it from a health risk into a quaint tourist adventure.
Reduced Meteor Strikes

For the first time in the history of the universe, the phrase "killer satellites" actually has a practical meaning. Thanks to cheap and robust sources of energy and heavily shielded orbitals, major meteor threats are neutralized high in the atmosphere.
Reduced Polar Tempests
Controlled global warming, advanced thermo-efficient architecture, and really warm parkas have greatly lessened the negative effects of this anomaly.
Reduced Magnetic Field
Once directed non-baryonic magnetic flux technology was reduced to handheld size, the negative impacts of this anomaly were greatly reduced.
Reduced Kessler Syndrome
Though it took time, patience, and very large nets, much of the orbital debris that circulated the planet has been removed or dumped planetside for recycling.
Reduced Acid Rain
Partially by reducing the effects of the fumaroles and partially by hardening the infrastructure, many of the problems caused by this anomaly have been alleviated.
Reduced Irradiation
By developing and improving the ozone layer and atmosphere while better insulating construction, a large part of the dangerous effects of this radiation has been removed.
Explore Moon

More than a simple expedition, the goal of this effort is to build colonies, study in detail any anthropological or archaeological remains of the Endless, and turn the moon into an extension of the planet.
Explore Binaries

The two moons that orbit this planet have an ancient history together. Ideally they would be explored simultaneously as magnetic field effects, gravitation, and any archaeological discoveries are likely to be shared.
Multiple Moon Mission

Too complex at first to send living explorers, probes to the moons are a good starting point for analysis. Eventually, the establishment of bases, mines, and shipyards would be ideal to maximize the potential bounty.
Aggression Engineering
While it requires interference directly with reproduction systems and DNA, various traits can be removed from wildlife to make it less savage and more edible.
Access Engineering

By building giant, snake-like engineering systems that tunnel through mountains and use the debris to build bridges and roads, with a bit of patience and a lot of noise certain planets can be rendered more livable.
Soil Engineering

Fertile soil cannot come from laying down sterile dirt. To effectively support planet and animal life, the nutrients, microbes, and insects that can turn it into a rich basis for agriculture must be added and nurtured.
Rift Engineering
A minor and controlled version of an interdimensional rift can be locally created and managed. By drastically reducing magnetic and gravitic forces, a permanent change in gravity can be achieved.
Peacetime Prosperity Initiative
Super Tax Act
No matter how well you try to sell it, when taxes go up nobody is happy. While it won't lead to revolution, this latest hike in value-added tax does cause some discontent in the population.
Galactic Wealth Preservation Program
Parks not Quarks

While the academic and scientific communities are up in arms about this, there are times when an empire needs to focus on the creation of wealth rather than the creation of knowledge. This law forces administrations to invest in wealth-generating business parks rather than research.
Initiative To Raise War Finances Through Fiscal Instruments
Wartime Taxes Bill

In order to finance increased war spending, your warplanning committee has tabled a law that would increase taxes on luxuries and personal property to fund the war efforts. Analysts predict little backlash from the population, as battlefield victories are relayed to the homeworlds.
Expanded Defenders of the Realm Decree
Larger Hosts Bill

Overnight, this law can transform your empire's defensive strength. Once passed, all systems enjoy an immediate, significant rise in the size of ground forces as every family is ordained to send their eldest-born to the military. Moreover, with the supplementary edict of instituting a routine of persuasive sermons that rejoice in the life of the soldier, armies will grow faster.
Long-Term Knowledge Program
Brains over Bucks

A number of acts are passed that channel public funds into research, both private and public. While it is not cheap, the senators who back the measure are convinced that in the long term it will pay off handsomely.
Outreach for Academic Excellence Initiative
Cram Exam Act

Believing that the standard of education is not where it should be, students at all levels have additional courses in math, sciences, and technology. The additional effort to improve technical knowledge will pay off, but there are a lot of unhappy scholars out there.
Citizen-Senator Outreach Act
Senator Bob Act

In order to improve the communication and level of involvement of all citizens in their government, a new technology platform is put into place that will aid all voters to contact and interact with their representatives. While it won't exactly turn the being in the street into a Senator, it does make them much happier with their government.
In-System Fleet Operational Readiness Protocol
Safe Skies Bill

More of a cosmetic measure than anything with bite, this law nonetheless significantly raises the happiness of systems with orbital fleets. How? Any fleet when in-system is mandated to maintain operational readiness, and fly scouting missions round the clock. In military terms it's equivalent to polishing a bayonet, but the public lap it up. Suckers.
Empire Entertainment and Education Initiative
Toys for Boys Decree

Primarily a way to turn technology and science development into new, cool gadgets, this law was much derided for simply coming up with new ways for the average citizen to waste time and resources for personal pleasure.
Zero Tolerance Waste Act

Bringing their expertise in ecologically-minded living to ensure that all materials are recycled back into use, the enaction of this piece of Niris-inspired legislation raises Approval levels across the Empire. It is especially effective in more modernized systems, where the society infrastructure can make the recycling processes more aesthetically appealing.
Symbiotic Living
Improved Vessel Speed and Exploration Program
Star Boogie Bill

A noble effort by a team of serious researchers, this group of laws ensures that ship structures and systems are developed with movement speed in mind. From mass and density analyses to engine power and efficiency curves, no scientific stone is left uncovered. Its proponents, obviously, are less happy with the unfortunate nickname that stuck.
Counseling, Orientation, and Guided Schooling Program
Dirty Hands Act

Keeping a close hand on education and apprenticeship systems allows the Senate to funnel the empire's human resources where they are most needed. This law, if passed, will result in a stronger and more efficient workforce in terms of production and construction. Dubbed the "Dirty Hands" Bill by opponents, some claim that only the higher arts and sciences should be supported with public money.
Healthy Offspring Gene Therapy Amendment
Need To Breed Bill

Channeling scientific expertise into the areas of infant mortality, pre-natal screening, and gestation lengths under the aegis of improving offspring health is a program that enjoys widespread support. The real benefit for administrators, though, is one of the major by-effects: increased rates of population growth.
Offensive Improvements for Empire Security Act
Mine's Bigger Decree

Concerned by an increasing level of galactic conflict, the Senate pulls together a series of standards and regulations to increase the output of weapons systems. While decried by some as paranoid, many feel that carrying a bigger stick is a better thing.
Affordable Home Automation Act (AHA)
AHA
In this day and age, nobody should have to prepare their morning stimulants manually. This new bill seeks to make basic home automation systems a fundamental right, to the delight of nearly everyone.
Governmental Directive, Codename: Blue Skies Project
Oracle Of Science

This top-secret law orders a cabal of the empire's most eminent scientists and engineers to form up a working group charged with inventing cutting-edge science with practical applications. The result? Your empire can research technologies belonging to the next era.
Education, Research and Knowledge Act (EUREKA)
EUREKA

The Senate aims to boost Science through increased educational and research funding across the board. It may take a few years to see results, but historical data suggests that investments like these are often worth their weight in gold.
New Colony Freedom and Expansion Statute
New Colony Rule

Everybody loves good news from the frontiers of the empire, and this legislation helps to formalize and encourage the feelgood factor that comes with the founding of a new colony on a distant world. As well as instituting an official period of national celebration, this rule further fosters the whole population's sense of contentment by lowering the barriers for industrial expansion.
Pioneer Core Vessels Infrastructure Framework

Motherships are vital for Ship Bound empires to colonize new worlds and grow. The Pioneer Core Vessels Infrastructure Framework, shortened to Core Vessel Order, consists of a restructuration and optimization of anchored Motherships' infrastructure to allow for faster expansion and population growth.
Core Vessels Order
Mining and Refining Efficiency Improvement Decree
Mineral Misers Act

Reasoning that it makes more sense to maximize what you have on hand rather than go out and look for more, this framework requires mining and processing companies to exploit to the maximum all resources extracted in the empire.
Spacefaring Survivability Improvement Act
Fleet Fortitude Decree

Constructing fleets is an expensive business, and it all goes to waste if the fleet does not survive battle. Worse, no politician likes to read casualty reports. This law augments the strength and survivability of ships by providing incentives for shipbuilding conglomerates to use tougher materials in their fleet yards and improve their designs.
Sensible Overtime Policy Framework
Work Not Shirk Act

Dubbed the "Work Not Shirk" Act by some its biggest champions, the Sensible Overtime Policy Framework, gives corporations the right to impose additional hours on their workers during periods of high economic growth. The result? Substantial increases in industrial production on every planet.
Sensible Overtime Policy Framework
Work Not Shirk Act

Dubbed the "Work Not Shirk" Act by some its biggest champions, the Sensible Overtime Policy Framework, gives corporations the right to impose additional hours on their workers during periods of high economic growth. The result? Substantial increases in industrial production in every Colony.
Improvement Completion Incentivisation Scheme
Dust Windfall

Builders, somewhat justifiably, don't always have the greatest reputation when it comes to completing projects on time and on budget. The incentive to drag things out, especially in major public works funded by government, can be overwhelming. This law, however, can help alleviate this issue by offering attractive Dust completion bonuses.
Congressional Hearings for Urbanization and Industry (CHURN)
CHURN

The Senate hopes to implement large-scale organizational changes that, if successful, would slash industrial overhead across the empire. Over the next few years, these streamlining measures are expected to reduce paperwork in the average corporation by up to forty-five percent.
Ordinance for the Responsible Exploitation of Natural Resources
My Precious Precept

The development of natural resources often goes hand in hand with pollution, over-exploitation, and scarcity. This series of laws ensures that resources are used in a way that guarantees the highest standards of quality and sustainability while reducing waste and inventory shrinkage.
Peace Among Extraterrestrials Charter
Make Love Not War Rule

By adopting this law, which aims to promote greater contentment among the population, your empire solidifies its commitment to a less militaristic outlook. Empires with many allies and peace treaties should find the happiness of their populace strengthened considerably.
Non-Military Intervention Framework
Trusted Broker

Diplomatic encounters always proceed more smoothly when one comes from a peace-loving culture who are unlikely to let bitter negotiations escalate into declarations of war. Institutionalizing this reality into an official legal framework, practically speaking, means that diplomatic deals are significantly less costly--whether dealing with major or minor civilizations.
Fair Trade Addendum to Company Inception Legislation (Fair Trade Bill)
Fair Trade Bill

By instituting the principles of fair, ethical standards of business from the ground up, your empire stand proudly, if not a little smugly, when it comes to its own agents' intergalactic business dealings. More importantly, in fiscal terms, instead of harming profits (which is often assumed of any peacenik policy), this bill actually increases Dust revenues.
Lower Trade Tariffs Framework for Peacemakers
Peace Economy

By simplifying the legislation that accounts for industrial disputes and other business conflicts, this law slashes the costs for upgrading Trade Companies. Instead of commercial enterprises wasting precious Dust on lavish legal fees that pay for "fact-finding" missions, business lunches of Epicurean excess, and office refurbishment, the money can go elsewhere.
Prosperity through Peace and Performance Edict
Right Thing Rule

A modern, galactic government will largely react to the desires of its citizens.
